loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is 32 years old and married with two children. She runs a retail shop to earn a living. Her other source of income is from her husband. She has been in the business for six years and has employed one person. She describes her business environment as competitive. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to expand her business. Her hope is to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a bar of soap, sodas and sugar.

loans.use: To buy a bar of soap, sodas and sugar

loans.name: 12 De Junio Group

texts.es:
Este Comité se formo a través una de las miembros, quienes se habían acercado hasta la Oficina de la Fundación Paraguaya para interiorizarse más al respecto del  Programa Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras, la misma invito a sus amigas y compañeras del Barrio y decidieron sumarse al trabajo grupal para salir adelante y así mejorar su estilo de vida, son 16 mujeres trabajadoras y humildes que deben ganarse el sustento todos los días. Ellas  son independientes en sus labores, pero también realizan actividades en conjunto para fomentar su compañerismo.
Una de las integrantes es la señora Herminia, quien nos comenta que tiene una pequeña despensa que con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo puedo sacar adelante. Gracias a su arduo trabajo y al empeño que pone en su negocio puede tener el dinero necesario para ayudar a su familia y mantener su hogar. Su meta es poder seguir creciendo y de esa forma poder ser una gran comerciante.
Ella pide la ayuda de la fundación y de kiva para la compra de bebidas, carne, embutidos, verduras y demás insumos de primera necesidad para poder surtir su local.
texts.en:
This community bank formed thanks to one of its members, who approached the offices of Fundación Paraguaya for more information about the community bank program for enterprising women. She then invited her friends and neighbors, and they decided to collaborate as a group in order to get ahead and thereby improve their way of life. They are sixteen hardworking, humble women who must earn their living every day. They work independently in their efforts, but also do group activities to cement their camaraderie. 

One of the group's members is Herminia. She tells us that she has a small store, and with much sacrifice and effort she can get ahead. Thanks to the hard work and determination she puts into her business, she is able to earn the money necessary to help her family and maintain her home. Her goal is to continue growing and in this way become a great storekeeper. 

Herminia is asking for help from Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva to buy drinks, meat, sausage, vegetables and other basic foodstuffs, with which to supply her business.

loans.use: to buy beverages, meat, sausage, vegetables and other supplies.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is 31 years old and married with one child who is eight years old. She is running a tailoring shop to earn a living. She has been in the business for five years and has employed two people. She describes her business environment as competitive because many people do the same business. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to grow her business. She has applied for 30,000 Kenya Shillings to buy clothing material for dressmaking.

loans.use: To buy clothing material for making dresses

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is 46 years old and married with five children. He owns a green grocery store and sells potatoes, beans and vegetables to earn a living. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income. He hopes to expand his business to a wholesale one in the future. He has applied for 15,000 Kenya Shillings to buy beans, peas, potatoes and vegetables.

loans.use: To buy beans, peas, potatoes and vegetables

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en: Naomi is 26 years old and married with two children who are 6 and 8 years old. She owns a grocery store and sells potatoes. She has been in the business for six years and has employed two people. She describes her business as competitive because many people do the same job that she does. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income. She hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy potatoes.

loans.use: To buy potatoes

loans.name: Charo Mungwari

texts.en:
Charo Mungwari is a 50-year-old livestock keeper in Mariakani. He is a married father of four. He has been selling livestock and livestock products for the past two years and he is doing great.

This is Charo’s third loan from KADET. He plans to buy more goats, cattle and chickens. He will use the anticipated profits to educate his children and repay his loan. He hopes to have a successful family.

loans.use: to buy more goats, cattle and chickens

loans.name: Mbilia

texts.en: Mbilia is 36 years old and single with one child who is seven years old.  She sells goats to earn a living and has been in the business for six years. She also does farming to earn an income. She describes herself as hardworking. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income. She hopes to be selling cows in the future. She has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy goats.

loans.use: To buy goats

loans.name: Edward

texts.en:
Edward is 58 years old, married to Elizabeth and has four children. Edward is a tea farmer in Kaptobogen location and has been farming tea for the last 18 years, earning a monthly income of KES 9,200.

He is requesting his first loan with KADET of KES 20,000. He wishes to use the funds to purchase fertilizers for his tea estate. With the anticipated profits from the farm, he will save to improve his tea plantations.

His hopes are to own larger tea estates in his locality and improve the living standards of his family.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is 31 years old and married with one child who is eight years old. She does dairy farming to earn a living and runs a transport business. She has been in the business for two years and since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to develop her business. She hopes to expand her business to a big dairy farm in the future. She has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy animal feed and to service her transport vehicle.

loans.use: To buy animal feed and to service her transport vehicle

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
La socia Gloria pertenece al banco comunal "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Calca perteneciente al departamento de Cusco, a una hora de la ciudad del Cusco.

La socia tiene 22 años de edad y es conviviente, la socia tiene 1 hijo de 11 meses de edad; la socia se dedica  la compra y venta de productos de belleza, ella vende por catalogos, la socia tambien se dedica  la agricultura ella siembra y cosecha maíz, la socia en esta ocasión desea el prestamo para invertir en la compra de maíz para sembrar y luego abonar.

La socia agradece el prestamo y se compromete a cumplir conel pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
The member Gloria belongs to the communal bank "Mamacha asunta de Calca"; The bank is located in the province of Calca, which is located in the division of Cusco, one hour from the city of Cusco.

The member is 22 years old, is living with her partner and has one child, age 11 months. The member buys and sells beauty products for a living. She sells by catalogs. The member also plants and harvests corn for a living. On this occasion she desires a loan to invest in the purchase of corn to plant and later fertilize. She appreciates the loan and promises to comply with the payment schedule and the timeline established.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of corn to plant and later fertilize.

loans.name: Annastacia

texts.en: Annastacia is 50 years old and married with two children who are one and five years old. She sells tomatoes, potatoes and cereals to earn a living. She has been in the business for three years. Her other source of income is from farming. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to expand her business. She hopes to see her business grow to a wholesale one in the future. She has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy tomatoes, potatoes and cereals.

loans.use: To buy tomatoes, potatoes and cereals

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is a resident of Murang'a in Central Kenya and is aged 60 and married with 3 adult children. He has been in farming for 20 years and currently produces coffee and bananas for the local market. He works as a blacksmith besides farming.

David has requested a loan of 41,600 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. He says this will provide him with milk for daily family need and income to meet other supplementary family needs. He adds the venture into dairy farming will provide him with ready cash to carry out expansion of his farming business regularly and make his blacksmith business better. 

David says the costs of feeds has been the greatest challenge to farmers.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Serah

texts.en: Serah is 38 years old and married with three children. She sells used clothes to earn a living and has been in the business for five years. She describes her business environment as favorable and her customers as available. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to educate her children and develop her business. She hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: Irene

texts.es:
La socia Irene pertenece al banco comunal "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Calca perteneciente al departamento de Cusco, a una hora de la ciudad del Cusco.

La socia tiene 58 años de edad y es casaca, la socia tiene 4 hijos los cuales son todos ellos independientes, la socia es propietaria de una quinta restaurante en pleno corazón de Calca, la socia le ha puesto de nombre Quinta Kintachos, y es un acogedor local y cuenta con la amabilidad de esta señora que ha integrado a sus hijos para el mejor desempeño de su negocio, la socia es una mujer trabajadora y en esta ocasión desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de insumos para la preparación de sus diferentes potajes; La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de sus diferentes potajes.


La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Irene belongs to the community bank Mamacha Asunta de Calca. The bank can be found in the province of Calca, which is in the Cusco department, an hour away from the city of Cusco.
She is 58 years old and married. She has 4 children who are all independent. She is the proprietor of a restaurant in the heart of Calca. She has given in the name Quinta Kintachos and it is a cozy place the benefits from the kindness of this lady who has also brought her children into the business so that it can grow. She is a hardworking woman and, at this time, she wants to invest her loan in buying supplies for preparing a variety of dishes. 
She is grateful for the loan and promises to make the repayments according to the established timetable.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make a variety of dishes.

loans.name: Kimanzi

texts.en: Kimanzi is 35 years old and married. He owns a butcher shop and he has been in the business for 3 years. His other source of income is from his farming activities. He describes himself as a hardworking person. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to expand his business. He hopes to expand his business further in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy cows.

loans.use: To buy cows

loans.name: Ranulfo

texts.es:
El Sr. Ranulfo tiene 69 años de edad, está casado con la Sra. Elva hace 39  años, tienen  6  hijos juntos. El  Sr. Ranulfo es un hombre luchador, que a pesar de su edad aun tiene mucha fuerza para llevar adelante su despensa y la manutención de su familia quienes le ayudan día a día.
El es el que se encarga de las provisiones de su despensa. Trae del mercado local todo lo que le falta para reponer sus mercaderias, tiene una moto con una caja montada para transportar sus cargas. Es una persona digna de imitar, su esposa comenta que a veces se siente cansado pero al ver a sus hijos crecer y con necesidad del estudio lo ayudan a sentirse vigoroso y seguir luchando, le da gracias a la vida por brindarle mucha salud y a la Fundación Paraguaya y a kiva por darle oportunidad de seguir progresando.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, hortalizas y demás insumos de primera necesidad para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Ranulfo is 69 years old, has been married to Elva for 39 years, and they have 6 children together. Ranulfo is a man who strives to get things done and, in spite of his age, still has plenty of strength to make his store a success and to keep his family (who help him everyday.) 
He is in charge of supplying his store. He brings everything he needs to replenish his stocks from the local market. He has a motorbike with a box mounted on it to transport his supplies. He is a person worthy of imitation. His wife comments that he sometimes feels tired but, when he sees his children grow-up and need help to be able to study, this helps him to feel strong and keep on fighting. He gives thanks for having good health and thanks Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva for giving him the opportunity to keep progressing.
He is requesting the loan to buy food, drinks, vegetables, and other staple goods to supply his store.

loans.use: to buy food, drinks, vegetables, and other staple goods.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en: Paul is 47 years old and married with six children who are 2, 8, 13, 16, 20 and 22 years old. He does dairy farming to earn a living. He has been in the business for five years. He describes his business environment as favorable because he has regular customers. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to develop his business. He hopes to have five cows in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a cow.

loans.use: To buy a cow

loans.name: Tabitha

texts.en: Tabitha is a widow and has four children between 21 and 36 years old. She describes herself to be honest and determined woman. She runs a restaurant and sells tea, food and snacks. She has been in this business for the last six years. Her business challenge has been insufficient funds for improving the restaurant. She will be using the loan of KES 20,000 to buy restaurant tables and chairs. In the next five years, Tabitha hopes and dreams to run a bigger restaurant.

loans.use: To buy tables and chairs for the restaurant.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret, 31 years old, is married and has a seven-year-old daughter. She describes herself to be customer friendly. She sells firewood. She has been in this business for the last two years. Previously, she was employed at a retail shop. Her business challenge is insufficient funds for improving the firewood retail store. She will be using the loan of KES 10,000 to buy more firewood. Margaret's hope and dream is to run several retail stores selling firewood in the next five years.

loans.use: To buy more firewood to sell

loans.name: Kesiah

texts.en: Kesiah is 42 years old, divorced with two children aged 11 and 20. She sells charcoal to earn a living and has been in the business for one year. She describes her business environment as good because there is limited competition. Since she joined Faulu Kenya she has been able to save her income. She hopes to start a retail shop and be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy more charcoal.

loans.use: To buy more charcoal

loans.name: Ann

texts.en: Ann is 29 years old and sells beauty products to earn a living. She has been in the business for 2 years. She describes herself as humble and hardworking. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to invest. She hopes to own a big shop in the future. She has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy beauty products such as body lotion.

loans.use: To buy beauty products such as body lotion

loans.name: Zaragoza

texts.es: El  señor Zaragoza es  una  persona  trabajadora la cual lleva  varios  años  dedicándose a  la  carpintería esto le  a permitido  salir adelante  día  con  día ,  nos comenta  que   regularmente   sus  clientes  le  realizan pedidos de  diferentes   trabajos  y en  ocasiones   se le  complica elaborarlos ya  que no  cuenta  con la materia  prima  suficiente   para   realizarlos,  en esta  ocasión se  acerco a la institución  ya  que  requiere comprar madera  para  seguir   laborando,  ve   en  el crédito la posibilidad  de   hacer   crecer  su  negocio y   brindar  a su  familia  una  estabilidad  económica, por lo cual se  encuentra   muy contento de habernos  encontrado.
texts.en: Zaragoza is a hardworking person who has been a carpenter for some years and this has enabled him to keep going, day by day. He tells us that his clients regularly put in orders for different jobs and he sometimes has difficulty doing the work because he doesn't have enough raw materials for the job. He came to the micro-loan institution as he needs to buy wood in order to keep working. He sees the loan as an opportunity to keep growing the business and to offer his family some economic stability. For this reason, he is very happy to have found us.

loans.use: to buy wood for carpentry jobs.

loans.name: Kelvin

texts.en: Kelvin is 22 years old and single. He operates a printing shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for three years and has employed one person. He describes his business environment as favorable for business because there is less competition. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income. He hopes to expand his business to a big company and be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a printer.

loans.use: To buy a printer

loans.name: Erastus

texts.en: Erastus is 20 years old. He sells water to earn a living. He has been in the business for one year. He describes his business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income. He hopes to expand his business and be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a plastic tank and pipes.

loans.use: To buy a plastic tank and pipes

loans.name: Abel

texts.es: El señor Abel es jubilado y tiene una tienda de venta de abarrotes . El crédito lo requiere para la compra de mercadería (arroz, azúcar, fideos, dulces, refrescos, etc.) para tener una variedad de productos que ofrecer a su clientela. Abel  es casado y tiene cuatro hijos. Vive en casa propia  la misma queda ubicada en la zona Alto Seguencoma   de la Ciudad de La Paz. Es la segunda vez que trabaja con kiva y la sexta vez que solicita un crédito de IMPRO, de tal manera que tiene un historial crediticio excelente.
texts.en:
Abel is retired, and he has a grocery store.  He needs the loan to buy merchandise (rice, sugar, noodles, sweets, and soft drinks, etc.) in order to have a variety of products to offer his customers.

Abel is married and has four children.  He lives in his own house in the Alto Sequencoma zone of the city of La Paz.

This is the second time he has worked with Kiva and the sixth time he has requested a loan with IMPRO.  He therefore has an excellent credit history.

loans.use: to buy noodles, rice, sugar, and other products for his grocery store.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 37 years old and married with four children who are 3, 5, 11 and 13 years old. He runs a barber shop. He has been in the business for three years and has employed two people. He works as a driver to earn extra income. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standards. He hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 30,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a shaving machine.

loans.use: To buy a shaving machine

loans.name: Evelyne

texts.en: Evelyne is 23 years old and married with two children aged 1 and 5. She owns a grocery store and sells onions, tomatoes, potatoes and cabbages to earn a living, she has been in the business for 4 years and has employed one person. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income. She hopes to expand her business into wholesale in the future. She has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy onions, tomatoes, potatoes, and cabbages.

loans.use: To buy onions, tomatoes, potatoes and cabbages

loans.name: Carine

texts.es:
La Sta. Carine tiene 19 años de edad, es soltera, y vive en la casa de sus padres. Es una persona muy activa y con ganas de superación. En la Ciudad de Curuguaty la posibilidad de conseguir empleo es muy difícil, es por esta razón que ella se inició en la venta de joyas de plata con un pequeño capital que su papa le prestó para poder iniciarse.
Hoy día ya tiene clientela formada, sus ventas las realiza a crédito y al contado, sus joyas son muy apreciadas por su buena calidad, buen gusto, bajo precio y facilidad de pago. Comenta que se dedica hace 2 años a esto y que además también vende perfumes en lo cual también le va muy bien y está creciendo de a poco. Tiene una moto en la cual realiza sus recorridos para la visita a los clientes.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de perfumes, ya que quiere poder seguir con su negocio y quiere abastecerse para poder atraer a más personas.
texts.en:
Carine is 19 years old, single, and lives with her parents. She is a very active person who wants to get on in life. It is very difficult to find work in the city of Curuguaty, and for this reason she started a business selling silver jewelry with a little capital that her father lent her so she could get started.
Today, she already has regular clients. She sells on credit and for cash and her jewelry is all very much appreciated because of its good quality, tastefulness, low price, and her easy payment schemes. She says that she has been doing this work for 2 years and that she also sells perfumes and that this is going very well and business is growing little by little. She has a motorbike which she uses to visit her customers. 
She is requesting a loan to buy perfumes as she wants to be able to keep the business going and she wants to stock-up in order to attract more people.

loans.use: to buy perfumes to then sell.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth is 29 years old and married with two children aged 2 and 8. She sells vegetables to earn a living. She has been in the business for 3 years . She describes her business environment as good because she has many customers. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to support her family financially. She hopes to open a big shop in the future. She has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy more vegetables.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables

loans.name: Irene Okwas

texts.en:
Irene Okwas is a 49-year-old landlady in Kilifi. She is a widow and a mother of three. She has been a landlady for the past ten years, and she is doing great. 

This is Irene’s second loan from KADET. She plans to renovate her rental houses. She will use the anticipated profits to build more houses to rent. She hopes to own several rental houses in Kilifi.

loans.use: to renovate her rental houses

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: La señora Beatriz es costurera  y su esposo trabaja en el área de  construcción. El crédito que requiere es para  trámites legales de protocolización y transferencia  de un bien inmueble a su nombre. Beatriz es casada y tiene dos hijos. Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona  de Pasankeri  de la Ciudad de La Paz. Beatriz se encuentra muy contenta con el crédito  ya que le ayudara a registrar su propiedad. Es la primera vez que trabaja con kiva y la segunda vez que solicita un crédito de IMPRO.
texts.en:
Beatriz is a seamstress, and her husband works in construction.

The loan that she needs is for legal notarization and transfer of a property to her name.

Beatriz is married and has two children.  She lives in her parents’ house in the Pasankeri zone of the city of La Paz.

She is very happy with the loan because it will help her register her property.  This the first time she has worked with Kiva and the second time she has requested a loan with IMPRO.

loans.use: to pay the costs of legal notarization and transfer of property that she bought to her name.

loans.name: Marcia Isabel

texts.es:
Marcia de 35 años es una mujer trabajadora que tiene muchas aspiraciones en su negocio por eso quiere que su servicio de venta de comida mejore. Comenzó su negocio de venta de comida con su esposa hace unos años atrás   

En la actualidad trabaja desde las 08h00am hasta las 12:00 haciendo platos para venderlos a sus clientes. Los platos que cocina son los tradicionales como caldo de pata, caldo de bolas, legumbres, arroz con menestra y carnes etc. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones de continuar con su negocio ya que le ayuda a mejorar su estilo de vida y de sus hijos. Quiere comprar con el préstamo carnes, legumbres, frutas, granos para hacer platos variados.
texts.en:
Marcia, 35, is a hardworking woman who has many aspirations for her business. Consequently, she wants to improve her food selling service. She started her food selling business with her husband several years ago.

Currently she works from 8 a.m. until 12 noon making dishes to sell to her customers. Her dishes are traditional ones such as caldo de pata (cow hooves soup), caldo de bolas (plantain dumplings soup), vegetables, rice with beans and meat, etc. 

She has many aspirations to continue her business since it is helping her to improve her life style and that of her children. She wants to use the loan to buy meat, vegetables, fruit and grains in order to make her varied dishes.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, fruit and grains.

loans.name: Theresia

texts.en: Theresia is 43 years old and single with two children aged 10 and 15. She runs a tailoring shop to earn a living, and she has been in the business for eight years. She describes her customers as schools and hotels. Since she joined Faulu Kenya she has been able to employ one person. She hopes to be a wholesale distributor of school uniforms in her region in the future. She has applied for a loan of 75,000 Kenya Shillings to buy cloth material for making school uniforms.

loans.use: to buy cloth material for making school uniforms

loans.name: George

texts.en: George is 29 years old and married with two children, ages five and nine months. He runs a welding shop. He has been in the business for two years and has employed four people. His other source of income is from tailoring. He describes his business environment as good because his customers visit him regularly. Since he joined Faulu Kenya he has been able to improve his living standards. He hopes to expand his business to a company in the future. He has applied for a loan of 80,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a welding machine.

loans.use: to buy a welding machine

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is 32 years old and married with two children ages four and 12. She sells used shoes to earn a living, and she has been in the business for three years. She describes her business environment as favorable for business because of little competition. Since she joined Faulu Kenya she has been able to expand her business. She hopes to start a boutique in the future. She has applied for a loan of 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy more shoes to sell to her customers.

loans.use: to buy more shoes to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Julian

texts.es:
Julián tiene 20 años de edad, es soltero, y nos cuenta que vive con sus padres, en su modesta casa de Curuguaty. El nos cuenta que se dedica en la Venta y Reparación de Teléfonos Celulares, Accesorios,  Carcazas en general. 
Comenta que se dedica a este negocio hace 3 años, por lo que tiene buena experiencia en este trabajo y sumado a eso, ya pudo formarse una buena clientela. Su local comercial se halla ubicado en pleno centro de la Ciudad de Curuguaty.
Necesita el crédito para la compra de repuestos y accesorios de Teléfonos Celular y de esa forma poder cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Julian is 20 years old, single and, he tells us, lives with his parents in their modest house in Curuguaty. He adds further that he sells and repairs cell phones, accessories and cases in general. He has been engaged in this business for 3 years so that he has a lot of experience in this work and has been able to build up a good clientele. His shop is located in the heart of the city of Curuguaty.

Julian needs the loan to buy cell phone parts and accessories so that he can meet his customers’ demands.

loans.use: to buy telephone parts and accessories..

loans.name: Benard

texts.en: Benard is 48 years old, married with 10 children. He sells fish to earn a living. He has been in the business for one year and employs one person. His other source of income is from his employment. He describes his business environment as busy because of the big population. Since he  joined Faulu Kenya he been able to build his own house. He hopes to expand his business and be financially stable in the future. He has applied for KES 20,000 to buy 2 sacks of fish to sell.

loans.use: To buy 2 sacks of fish to sell.

loans.name: Dulce Deyanira

texts.es: La señora Dulce es una persona emprendedora  y día   con día  se  esfuerza   por  salir  adelante, actualmente  ella  se  dedica  a  la venta de  hamburguesas  la  cual  realiza  en las   noches además de  vender  joyería,   ella  acudió  con nosotros   ya  que   requiere  realizar  la compra  de materia prima para continuar  trabajando en su puesto de comida,  agradece  el apoyo  brindado para  la  realización de  su proyecto   ya  que le  proporcionara la  oportunidad  de  hacer  crecer   su  negocio.
texts.en: Sra. Dulce is an enterprising person who works day after day to get ahead. Currently she is engaged in selling hamburgers which she makes at night. In addition she sells jewelry. She came to us since she needs to purchase ingredients so she can continue working at her food stall. She is grateful for the support enabling her to carry on her work, since it provides her the opportunity to expand her business

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to make hamburgers.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
La socia Hilda pertenece al banco comunal "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Calca perteneciente al departamento de Cusco, a una hora de la ciudad del Cusco.

La socia tiene 33 años de edad y es casada, la socia tiene 1 hijo de 6 años de edad; la socia se dedica  la compra y venta de productos deprimera necesidad porque tiene su tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio y ella implementa su negocio cada quincena; la socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad, la socia comprara arroz, azucar, leche, fideos.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Hilda is a member of the Mamacha Asunta de Calca communal bank in Calca province, Cusco department, an hour from Cusco.

She is 33, married and has a 6-year old son.  She buys and sells staple goods because she has a general store in her home and she sets up her business every two weeks.  Hilda is requesting a loan to buy basic products such as rice, sugar, milk and pasta.

This member appreciates the loan and promises to be punctual with her payments in the established time period.

loans.use: to buy staple goods such as rice, sugar, milk and pasta

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
La señora Eva elabora una serie de dulces para sahumerio (sahumerio es un ritual donde se ofrece a la madre tierra dulces y otros productos en agradecimiento y para que las cosas vayan bien a la familia); esta actividad es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para mantener  a su familia. El crédito lo requiere para comprar harina, azúcar, colorantes para continuar elaborando esa clase de dulces. Eva es casada y tiene tres hijos  de los cuales dos son independientes .  Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona  San Martín de la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la décima sexta vez que trabaja con IMPRO y la tercera vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en: Eva makes a series of sweets for “sahumerio” (a ritual where sweets and other products are offered to Mother Earth in gratitude and so that things will go well for the family).  This activity is her source of income for family support.  The loan she needs is to buy flour, sugar and coloring to continue making this kind of sweets.  Eva is married and has three children two of which are independent.  She lives in her own house located in La Paz’s San Martín zone.  This is the sixth time she’s worked with IMPRO and the third with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies to make sweets.

loans.name: Cintya

texts.es: Cintya tiene una tienda de abarrotes. El crédito lo requiere para compra de aceite, azúcar y fideos para poder ofrecer variedad de productos a su clientela. Cintya es soltera y no tiene hijos. Vive en casa de sus abuelos ubicada en la zona  de Pasankeri de la Ciudad de La Paz. Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en: Cintya has a grocery store.  She needs the loan to buy oil, sugar and noodles to be able to offer a variety of products to her clientele.  Cintya is single and has no children.  She lives in her grandparents’ house located in the city of La Paz’s Pasankeri zone.  This is the first time she’s worked with IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Nanci Yoni

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN VALENTIN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 50 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de cereales como trigo, cebada y quinua, ella vende al por mayor a los diferentes mercados desde las  8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cereales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cereales como trigo, quinua y cebada al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Nanci belongs to the communal bank "San Valentín". The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to Cusco Province and Cusco Department.

She is 50 years old and has a live-in partner and two children. She alternates her daily activities with her business, which is selling cereals such as wheat, barley and quinoa. She sells wholesale to different markets, from 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM. She is able to take care of her children by means of this business. Her goal is to set up a shop where she can sell cereal. She is requesting this loan to purchase cereal wholesale such as wheat, quinoa and barley.

She’s happy with the loan and commits to meet her installment payments on time.

loans.use: To purchase cereal wholesale such as wheat, quinoa and barley.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es: El señor Edgar trabaja como chofer propietario de un vehiculo de transporte público. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de repuestos para su vehiculo pues necesita cambiar anillas para continuar con su trabajo que  es la fuente de ingresos para mantener a su familia. Edgar es casado y tiene dos hijos .Vive en anticretico ubicada en la zona Santa Rosa de la Ciudad de La Paz.  Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a  IMPRO y kiva.
texts.en: Edgar works as a public transportation vehicle driver.  He needs the loan to buy spare parts for his vehicle because he needs to replace the piston rings in order to continue with his work which is his source of income for family support.  Edgar is married and has two children.  He lives in anticrético modality [transaction whereby a property owner requests a "loan" from you in exchange for housing, which must be paid back to you at the end of your contract. If your loan is not repaid, the property owner loses the property to you] in La Paz’s Santa Rosa zone.  It’s the first time he’s worked with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to pay to replace piston rings for his taxi.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.es: El sr. Reynaldo es un cliente antiguo y muy responsable en el pago de sus cuotas, el sr. Se dedica a la confección de pantalones de tela que al mismo tiempo lo comercializa en la zona de Sebastián en un puesto fijo que el tiene, en la visita que realizamos pudimos observar que es una persona muy cordial y respetuoso también  dedicado a su trabajo lo cual demuestra que es responsable a la hora de cancelar sus cuotas, el sr. Reynaldo vive en la zona  alto Chijini, solicita el crédito para comprar mas telas para confeccionar una mayor cantidad de pantalones que por la temporada de fin de año lo comercializara en algunas ferias de la ciudad de el alto como ser la feria 16 de julio.
texts.en: Reynaldo is an old customer, who very responsibly makes his installment payments. He works tailoring pants to sell them in a fixed stand in Sebastian district. During our evaluation, we saw that he is a very friendly, respectful person and committed to his job, which means he is also very responsible to make his installment payments. Reynaldo lives in Alto Chijini district. He is requesting this loan to buy more fabric to tailor a greater amount of pants to sell in some fairs in the city during the end of year season, for instance in the 16th of July fair.

loans.use: to buy fabric for end of year season.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN VALENTIN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia  tiene 21 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de picantería (es como un restaurant pero mas tipico), ella prepara platos típicos de la ciudad de Cusco, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el local de picantería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras, pollo y carne al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "San Valentín". The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to Cusco Province and Cusco Department.

She is 21 years old, has a live-in partner and two children. She alternates her daily activities with running a "picantería" (small and traditional restaurant). She prepares traditional Cusco dishes. She works from 8 AM until 6 PM and supports her children by means of this business. Her goal is to expand the picantería.

The member is requesting this loan to buy ingredients wholesale for cooking, such as rice, vegetables, chicken and meat. She’s happy with the loan and commits to meet her installment payments on time.

loans.use: to buy ingredients wholesale for cooking, such as rice, vegetables, chicken and meat.

loans.name: Cinthya

texts.es:
Cinthya se dedica a la preparación y venta de comida. El crédito lo requiere para compra de insumos (papa, chuño, carne, fideo y condimentos) que le ayudara a la preparación de alimentos. Cinthya es soltera  y no tiene hijos .Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona  de San Martín en  la Ciudad de La Paz. 
Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en: Cinthya works preparing and selling food.  She needs the loan to buy ingredients (potatoes, dehydrated potatoes, meat, noodles and condiments) that will help her prepare the food.  Cinthya is single and has no children.  She lives in her parents’ house located in the city of La Paz’s San Martín zone.  It is the first time she’s worked with IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for food preparation.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es:
El socio Ricardo pertenece al banco comunal "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Calca perteneciente al departamento de Cusco, a una hora de la ciudad del Cusco.

El socio tiene 43 años de edad y es casada, la socia tiene 2 hijos de 26, 18 años de edad; el socio trabaja en el ministerio de salud, el socio en esta ocasión desea invertir el prestamo en las matriculas de sus hijos en la etapa superior para que continuen sus estudios universitarios. El socio solicita el prestamo para invertir en la educación de sus hijos.
El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
The member Ricardo belongs to communal bank "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA", which is located in the province of Calca, department of Cusco, an hour away from the city of Cusco.

The member is 43, married and has 2 sons, one of whom is 26 and the other one 18. He works in the Ministry of Health.

On this occasion, the member wants this loan to invest in his children's higher education tuitions, so they can continue their university studies. The member requests this loan to invest in his children's education.

The member appreciates the loan and commits himself to pay his installments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To invest in his children's education.

loans.name: Sunyande

texts.en:
This is 48-year-old Sunyande.  She is married, and has five children a woman aged 30 (a trader), a 21-year-old male who is in form 5, an 18-year-old male and a 16-year-old male both in form 3, and a 7-year-old girl. She has no additional dependents living with her. 

In 1999, Sunyande established her fence posts and wood business. She began her business as a means of assisting her husband with domestic needs. Working 7 days a week and 6 to 7 hours a day, she makes about SLL 600,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan of SLL 3,000,000. Sunyande requires a loan in order to improve her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits to approximately SLL 900,000. In the future, Sunyande plans to educate her children and also she hopes to be a great business woman.   

She is thanking you for your support.

loans.use: To buy fence sticks and Wood for her business

loans.name: Honoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN VALENTIN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Honoria; ella tiene 35 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa como pantalones, blusas, polos, chompas y casacas, ella vende en forma independiente desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pantalones, chompas, blusas y casacas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to communal bank “SAN VALENTIN”, which is located in the district of Cusco, province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco.

The member is Honoria, she is 35, married and has 2 children. She alternates between her daily activities and the business of selling clothes such as trousers, blouses, polo shirts, sweaters and jackets.

She sells her products independently from 7 AM to 6 PM. This business allows her to support her children. The member's dream is to have a store where she can sell the clothes. She requests this loan to buy trousers, sweaters, blouses and jackets from wholesalers.

The member is happy for this loan and commits herself to pay her installments on time.

loans.use: To buy trousers, sweaters, blouses and jackets from wholesalers.

loans.name: Wara

texts.en:
This is 32-year-old Wara.  She is married and has five children aged 5, 11 (in class six) 14 (in junior secondary school form 3), 15 (in senior secondary school form 2) and 17.  Wara has no additional dependents living with her.  

 In 1995, Wara established her Maggi and other types of seasoning business.  She began her business at an early age. Everything about her is business. Working 7 days a week and 6 to 7 hours a day, she earns about Le 900,000 in profit every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000. 

Wara requires a loan in order to improve her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits to approximately Le 1,300,000. In the future, Wara plans to educate her children to university level and she intends to be a great business woman. She is thanking you for your support.

loans.use: To buy cartons of Maggi for her business.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es: La señora Miriam tiene un puesto de venta de maní azucarado, es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para mantener  a su familia.  Este producto es muy bien recibido por el común de la gente ya que es una costumbre muy antigua la de comer dicho maní azucarado. El crédito lo requiere para compra de insumos (maní y azúcar). Miriam es casada, tiene dos hijos y vive en alquiler ubicada en la zona de las Pasankeri de la ciudad de La Paz. Es la décima cuarta vez que trabaja con IMPRO y la cuarta vez con KIVA.
texts.en: Miriam has a stand selling candied peanuts; it’s her source of income for family support.  This product is very well-received by common folk because eating candied peanuts is a very ancient tradition.  She needs the loan to buy ingredients (peanuts and sugar).  Miriam is married and has two children.  She rents her house located in the city of La Paz’s Pasankeri zone.  It is the 14th time she’s worked with IMPRO and the fourth with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy peanuts and sugar.

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
This is 40-year-old Kadiatu.  She is married and has two children aged 15 and 10. She has no additional dependents living with her. Her husband is an air conditioner mechanic. 

 In 2003, Kadiatu established her drinks and building material business. She began her business after she obtained her first diploma in Business Admin but could not secure a job. Working 6 days a week and 8 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,500,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000. 

Kadiatu requires a loan in order to improve her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her profit during the festive period. In the future, Kadiatu plans to continue her education to Degree level and to educate her children.   She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more drinks for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SAN VALENTIN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 45 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de carne, el socio vende desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio el socio quiere salir adelante, el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de venta de carne. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar carne al por mayor.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the "San Valentin" communal bank, located in the district of Cusco, which is part of Cusco province, in Cusco department. He is 45 years old and single. 

He alternates his daily activities with his business of buying and selling meat. He sells from 9:00am to 6:00pm. By means of this business, the borrower wants to get ahead in life. His dream is to expand his meat-selling business.

He is applying for the loan in order to buy meat at wholesale. The borrower is happy about the loan, and promises to make his instalment payments.

loans.use: To buy meat at wholesale for later sale.

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es:
El socio Fredy pertenece al banco comunal "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Calca perteneciente al departamento de Cusco, a una hora de la ciudad del Cusco.

El socio tiene 31 años de edad y es conviviente, la socia tiene 1 hijo de 1  y medio años de edad; El socio trabaja en el ministerio de Salud, paralelamente a esto el socio ayuda con la quinta a su mamá ya que se a vuelto un negocio familiar el apoya con la atención los fines de semana el socio en esta ocasión desea invertir el credito en la compra de cervezas para implementar el negocio familiar de la quinta restaurante. El socio solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de cervezas al por mayor para implementar la quinta familiar.


El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
The borrower, Fredy, belongs to the " Mamacha Asunta de Calca" communal bank, located in the province of Calca, which is part of Cusco department, an hour from the city of Cusco. The borrower is 31, and lives with his partner. He has a 1 1/2 year-old child.  

He works in the Ministry of Health. Along with this, he helps his mother with an outdoor restaurant, as it has become a family business. He helps run it on weekends. On this occasion he wishes to use the loan to buy beer for the family business of an outdoor restaurant. 

The borrower is applying for the loan in order to buy beer at wholesale for the family's outdoor restaurant.  

He is grateful for the loan, and promises to make his instalment payments on time.

loans.use: To buy beer at wholesale for the family's outdoor restaurant.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SAN VALENTIN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 62 años de edad y es casado y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo como periodista, el escribe revistas y luego lo vende en forma independiente, el socio trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, el sueño del socio es terminar de editar su revistas. El  socio solicita el préstamo para imprimir sus revistas y también para comprar papeles al por mayor.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the "San Valentin" communal bank, located in the district of Cusco, which is part of Cusco province, in Cusco department.

He is 62, married, and has two children. He alternates his daily activities with his work as a journalist. He writes magazines and sells them independently.  He works from 7:00am to 6:00pm. His dream is to finish editing his magazines. The borrower is applying for the loan in order to print his magazines, and also to buy paper at wholesale.

He is happy about the loan, and promises to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to print his magazines, and also to buy paper at wholesale.

loans.name: La Nueva Esperanza De Corcona Group

texts.es: Félix es integrante de la Alcancía Comunal “La Nueva Esperanza De Corcona” grupo que está conformado por  08 socios dedicadas a distintas actividades comerciales. Félix tiene 55 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 04 hijos, la cual sigue apoyando a 02 de ellos ya que están en etapa escolar. Hace más de 18 años que Félix se dedica a la venta de comida, pues cuenta con un restaurante en su domicilio, el  empezó  repartiendo sus comidas poco a poco fue aumentando sus clientes es así como pudo ahorrar para poder instalar su propio restaurante, este es un negocio familiar ya que trabaja con su pareja y sus hijos, Félix se siente muy contento ya que ha podido brindarles  una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. El solicito el crédito para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio comprando  arroz, fideos, leche, aceite y azúcar. Félix tiene como meta aperturar otro restaurante donde sus hijos lo puedan  administrar. La Alcancía Comunal “La Nueva Esperanza de Corcona” están  agradecidos con el crédito brindado.
texts.en:
Félix is a member of the Communal Bank “La Nueva Esperanza De Corcona”, a group that is made up of 8 members who are in charge of different business activities. Félix, 55, lives with her domestic partner and has 4 children, two of whom she continues to support as they still go to school. 

Félix has sold food for more than 18 years and has a restaurant in her own house. She started out delivering food and gradually the number of customers grew so much that she was able to save money and establish her own restaurant.

This is a family business because she works together with her domestic partner and her children. Félix is very happy for the fact that she was able to provide her family with a better quality of life.

She requested the loan to continue to invest in her business, buying rice, noodles, milk, oil and sugar. Her goal is to open another restaurant that would be managed by her children. Communal Bank “La Nueva Esperanza de Corcona” is grateful for the loan which was granted.

loans.use: To buy rice, noodles, milk, oil and sugar.

loans.name: Gisela

texts.es:
La señora Gisela es costurera; vive con su hijo y su esposo el cual  es chofer; el crédito lo necesita para la compra del equipo de gas natural vehicular  para el taxi de su esposo, ya que es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para mantener  a su familia. Con esta modificación, el costo de combustible se verá notablemente reducido.Gisela vive en la zona San Martín ubicada en  la ciudad de La Paz. 
Es la séptima vez que Gisela trabaja con IMPRO y la sexta vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en: Gisela is a seamstress living with her son and husband who is a driver.  She needs the loan to buy a kit to change from gasoline to natural gas for her husband’s taxi because that’s the source of income for family support.  With this modification fuel costs will be noticeably reduced.  Griselda lives in the city of La Paz’s San Martín zone.  This is the 7th time she’s worked with IMPRO and the 6th with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy a kit to change from gasoline to natural gas for her taxi.

loans.name: Elfrida

texts.es: Elfrida tiene 34 años, está divorciada, pero tiene 02 hijos, con quienes vive en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Pichari. Elfrida es una mujer de buenos principios, y nos comenta que desde que separó de su esposo tuvo que afrontar sola los gastos de la casa. Es así que emprendió un negocio que es una Jugueria, ahí preprara jugos de diversas y ricas frutas y esto le ha dado mucha rentabilidad. Sin embargo para conseguir frutas le es dificila, pues alguno son escasos y otros sus precios son elevados. Generalmente trabaja con el apoyo de un ayudante, quien la facilita en pelar las frutas, mientras que ella prepara los jugos. En un futuro desea abrir una fuente de soda y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos. Este será su segundo credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1,500 soles lo invertirá en la compra de una licuadora, frutas y materiales para ambientar su puesto.
texts.en:
Elfrida is 34 and divorced, but has two children, with whom she lives in her own house, located in Pichari district. 

Elfrida is a woman with good principles, and tells us that since she separated from her husband, she has had to cope with the household expenses on her own. This is why she launched a business, which is a juice stand. There she prepares juices from various delicious fruits, and this has provided her with good earnings.

However, it is difficult for her to get fruit, as some are scarce, and the prices of others are high. 

Normally, she works with the support of a helper, who makes the work easier for her by peeling the fruit, while she prepares the juices. In the future, she wishes to open a soda fountain, and so be able to have better income. This will be her second loan with MFP, so she promises to make her instalment payments on time. 

She will use the 1,500 soles for the purchase of a blender, as well as fruit, and materials for running her stand.

loans.use: To buy a blender, fruit, and materials for running her stand.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es:
El socio Edwin pertenece al banco comunal "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Calca perteneciente al departamento de Cusco, a una hora de la ciudad del Cusco.

El socio tiene 25 años de edad y es conviviente, la socia tiene 1 hijo de 6 años de edad; el socio trabja en su propio negocio de proveedor de materiales de construcción, el socio trabaja comprando materiales de construcción y los distribuye, el socio desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de materiales para aumentar su negocio.

El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
The member Edwin belongs to communal bank "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA", which is located in the province of Calca, department of Cusco, one hour away from the city of Cusco.

The member is 25, lives with his domestic partner, and has 1 son who is 6 years old. He has his own business as a supplier of construction materials; he buys construction materials and then distributes them. The member wants to invest this loan in the purchase of materials to increase his business.

He is grateful for the loan and commits himself to pay his installments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy materials to increase his business.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN VALENTIN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia  ella tiene 42 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de zapatos, ella vende zapatos para mujeres, varones y niños, ella vende en forma independiente desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su hijo, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los zapatos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar zapatos al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This woman belongs to the community bank San Valentin. The bank is located in the Cusco district, which belongs to the Cusco province and Cusco department. 

The member is 42 years old, single and has one son. She alternates her daily activities with her business selling shoes. She sells shoes for women, men and children, and works on her own from 9AM to 6PM. Through this business she is able to give her son a good start in life. Her dream is to have a store where she can sell shoes. She's asking for the loan to buy shoes wholesale. 

This member is happy to have the loan and promises to satisfy her monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy shoes wholesale.

loans.name: Ginelba

texts.es:
La señora Ginelba solicita el crédito para la compra de juguetes (muñecas, autos, pelotas, transformers) y también para la compra de parlantes para computadoras, para variar su mercadería y ofrecerla a su clientela. Ginelba es casada, tiene un hijo y vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona Norte de la ciudad de La Paz. 
Es la octava vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la sexta con Kiva.
texts.en: Ginelba is asking for the loan to buy toys (dolls, cars, balls, transformers) and also to buy speakers for computers to vary her merchandise and offer it to customers.  Ginelba is married and has a son.  She lives in her parents’ house located the city of La Paz’s Norte zone.  This is the 8th time she’s worked with IMPRO and the 6th with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy children's toys and computer speakers to sell.

loans.name: Soriba

texts.en:
This is 24-year-old Soriba.  He is single and has no children. He has no additional dependents. In 2007, Soriba established his jeans business after he left school. Working 6 days a week and 8 hours a day, he earns about Le 353,000 as profit every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000 to buy his goods direct from the importer at a reduced rate.

 His major challenge is the fluctuation of the dollar against the Leone. He plans to be a major importer of clothing in the future. Soribah thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy  jeans for his business.

loans.name: Raul

texts.es:
El socio Raul pertenece al banco comunal "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Calca perteneciente al departamento de Cusco, a una hora de la ciudad del Cusco.

El socio tiene 34 años de edad y es soltero, El socio tiene una panadería y se dedica  ala atención, elaboración, y venta de los panes, pasteles y todo en cuanto salga de su panadería. El socio en esta ocasión desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de insumos, el socio comprara harina al por mayor, manteca, levadura, leña todo esto para el horno y continuar con el incremento de sus ganancias. El socio desea el prestamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de panes y pasteles.


El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Raul belongs to the communal bank "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA"; The bank is located in the province of Calca, in the department of Cusco, an hour away from the city of Cusco. 

This member is 34 years old and single. He has a bakery and he dedicates himself to the making and sale of breads, cakes and everything that comes out of his bakery. On this occasion Raul hopes to invest his loan to purchase ingredients, and he will buy wholesale flour, butter, yeast, and firewood for the oven, and will continue with the increase in his earnings. He wishes for this loan to invest in the purchase of ingredients to make breads and cakes. 

He appreciates this loan and promises to comply with debt repayments in the timeframe established.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of ingredients to make breads and cakes

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
Marcelina tiene 40 años, está casado con jorge de 45 años, fruto de esta relación tuvieron 3 hijos, con los que vive en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Pichari.
Marcelina, cuenta que a los 12 años de edad ya realizaba las labores agrícolas de cómo preparar un terreno para sembrar, la cosecha e incluso ya estaba preparada para realizar la comercialización. Fue así, que desde entonces ella junto a sus padres cultivaban cacao, café y plátano, aunque le daban mayor importancia al cacao y café, por ser productos que tienen mayor demanda en el mercado tanto nacional como internacional y por tal su valor es alto. Ahora continua con esta labor, cultivando café, pues en la cosecha anterior recolecto una buena cantidad de granos y por ende superó su ingreso económico. Es por esta razón que desea ampliar la siembra de café. En las labores que realiza siempre cuenta con el apoyo de su querido esposo quien le apoya en los trabajos más forzosos. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete  en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, comprará más almácigos de café.
texts.en:
Marcelina is 40 years old, has been married to Jorge for 45 years, and as a result of this relationship has 3 kids with whom she lives in her her own house located in the district of Pichari. 

Marcelina tells us that at 12 years of age she already knew how to perform agricultural tasks like preparing the earth to plant seeds, harvesting, and was already prepared to do the marketing. Ever since then, along with her parents, she has cultivated cocoa, coffee, and plantains, although they gave more importance to cocoa and coffee for being products that had greater demand in both the national and international markets and for their high value. Now she continues with this work, cultivating coffee, but in the past harvest she collected a large quantity of grains and surpassed her income. For this reason she would like to increase the amount of coffee she plants. In the work that she does she always counts on the support of her loving husband who helps her with the most difficult jobs. This will be her second loan with MFP, so she promises to promptly repay her debts. With this loan, she will buy more coffee seeds.

loans.use: to buy more coffee seeds to plant

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy dry grains, oil, soap, candy and other products.

loans.name: Victor Francisco

texts.es:
El señor Victor Francisco es casado, tiene 37 años de edad, estudio los 3 años de educación primaria, tiene 4 hijos los cuales estudian, se dedica a la artesanía a la elaboración de sandalias para damas y niñas, inició este trabajo por iniciativa propia y hasta el momento lleva  9 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de materiales como: piel, hilo, suelas, pegamento, etc. Espera en el futuro tener un negocio prospero.
texts.en: Victor Francisco is married, 37 years old and has a third-grade education. He has four children who are in school. He makes a living making hand-made sandals for women and children. He started the business on his own and has nine years of experience. He is requesting the loan to purchase supplies like leather, thread, soles, glue, etc. He hopes to have a prosperous business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to make sandals.

loans.name: Derly Hubert

texts.es:
El socio Derly pertenece al banco comunal "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Calca perteneciente al departamento de Cusco, a una hora de la ciudad del Cusco.

El socio tiene 24 años de edad y es soltero, el socio es estudiante y también realiza trabajos nemores como prestacion de reparto a domicilio, el socio tiene una moto en la cual se mobiliza para entregar los mandatos y desea en esta ocasióin implementarla para continuar con este apoyo el cual le permite pagar sus estudios. El socio solicita el prestamo para invertir en la implementación y mantenimiento de sus moto.

El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en: Derly belongs to the "Mamacha Ausnta de Calca" community bank located in the province of Calca, one hour from the city of Cusco. He is 24 years old and single. He is a student and also does odd jobs like home deliveries. He has a motorcycle that he uses to deliver the items, and at this time he wants to set it up so he can further use the bike to pay for his studies. He is requesting the loan to set up his motorcycle for more work and pay for its maintenance. Derly is grateful for the loan and promises to makes his payments at the established times.

loans.use: to pay for the implementation and maintenance of his motorcycle.

loans.name: Osman  Sheik

texts.en:
This is 53-year-old Osman Sheik.  He is married and has two children aged 30 (a plumber) and 22 (1st year in college). He has no additional dependents. 

In 1985, Sheik established his building material business.  He started in business from childhood. Working 7 days a week and 8 hours a day, he earns about Le 600,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000. 

Sheik has already received and successfully repaid two loans and now requires a new loan in order to increase his building material stock. Sheik has got over 20 years' experience in the building material business and has educated his children from this business. He plans to build a house from this business where he will enjoy his old age.

He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy building materials for his business.

loans.name: Umu

texts.en:
This is 34-year-old Umu.  She is married and has three children aged 15 (a male in form 1), 4 (a female in nursery school) and 2 (female). She has no additional dependents. 

 In 2001, Umu established her textile business. She started business after she completed form 3. Working 6 days a week and 7 hours a day, she earns about Le 324,000 as profit every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000.

 Umu requires this loan in order to improve her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits. In future, Umu plans to educate her children and also want to be a great businesswoman.   She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy cotton materials for her business.

loans.name: Otilia

texts.es:
Otilia es socia del Banco Comunal Casaorco, tiene 55 años, se dedica a la compra y venta de ganados, ovino y porcino, es madre de 7 hijos y socia de Finca Perú desde hace 5 años.
Otilia aprendió en Finca a poder ahorra y así cumplir todo lo que se proponía, le encanta las capacitaciones que recibe en su Banco Comunal porque le ayudan a poder mejorar sus relaciones familiares y en su negocio, ahora el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de vaquitas para hacerlas engordar, también invertirá en pasto.
texts.en:
Otilia is a member of Casaorco Community Bank. She is 55 years old and a mother to seven children. She makes a living buying and selling sheep and pigs. Otilia has worked with FINCA Peru for five years. 

Otilia learned at FINCA how to save and to accomplish everything she sets out to do. She enjoys the training she receives from her community bank because it helps her improve her family relationships and her business. Now she will use this loan to purchase calves for fattening, and will also invest in pasture.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María tiene 42 años, convive con Adrián de 41 años. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Pichari. María, tiene la clave del éxito, posee una tienda de abarrotes, negocio que es muy concurrida, ya que supo valorar y tratar bien a su clientela. A pesar de que María no tuvo estudios, ella sabe que su mejor cualidad es la de vender, además de la paciencia que tiene a sus clientes. Por otro lado el precio de sus productos están al alcance de la economía de sus asiduos compradores. Generalmente trabaja por cuenta propia a veces su esposo e hijos la apoyan en el negocio, y son quienes lo animan mucho a seguir con el trabajo. Lo único que la aqueja es la competencia por lo que debe siempre procurar llenar su tienda y buscar nuevas formas ed venta. En un futuro próximo desea implementar mejor su tienda con productos novedosos. Este será su segundo credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Ella está entusiasmada con seguir trabajando con su banco comunal por que son puntuales. Con los 2.500 nuevos soles, comprará nuevos productos para el expendio de su bodega.
texts.en: María is 42 years old and married to Adrián, 41. They live in their own home in the district of Pichari. María has the key to success: she has a grocery store that is heavily visited because she values and treats her customers well. Despite not having a formal education, she knows her biggest strength is salesmanship, as well as patience for her customers. Furthermore, her prices are affordable to her regular customers. She generally works on her own, but sometimes her husband and children help her with the business; they are her biggest motivation to keep working. Her only challenge is the competition, so she always must keep her store stocked and looks for new ways to sell products. In the near future she wants to introduce new products to her store. This will be her second loan with Kiva partner MPF, and she promises to make her payments on time. She is enthusiastic to continue working with her community bank because it is punctual. With the loan, she plans to purchase new products to expand her store.

loans.use: to purchase more products to stock her store.

loans.name: Zenas

texts.es:
Zenas de 47 años convive con Cristina con quien tiene 4 hijos pero solo vive con 2 de ellos de 20 y 18 años. Todos ellos viven en una casa propia en la comunidad nativa San Román Bajo, en el distrito de Perené, provincia de Chanchamayo. Zenas es un hombre agricultor. En todos sus años como padre ha trabajado con esmero sembrando café, plátanos y yucas. Ahora cuenta con 13 parcelas de terrenos donde los produce en mayor cantidad.
“Tenía 10 años trabajando con una cooperativa, pero ahora trabajo para particulares quienes pagan más por el kilo de café”, menciona.  Zenas comenta que se invierte demasiado en el abono, ya que sus sembríos necesitan fertilizantes 2 veces al año.
Es por ello que recibe el apoyo de sus hijos, quienes distribuyen su tiempo para no descuidar sus otras labores.
Ahora sus hijos estudian y no les falta mucho para que independicen, por ello Zenas espera ahorrar una cantidad de dinero para vivir tranquilamente con su esposa, sin necesidad de derrochar muchas fuerzas. Sería la primera vez que él recibiría un crédito de MFP, por eso se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas. “La Bella Durmiente” es el nombre de su banco comunal, menciona que será constante y participativo en las actividades del grupo. De obtener el dinero, lo invertirá en la compra de sacos de abonos que oscilan entre 120 y 130 soles. Tiene pensado comprar  10 sacos.
texts.en:
Zenas, 47, lives with is common-law wife, Cristina, and two (ages 20 and 18) of their four children.  They live in their own house in the native community of San Román Bajo in the district of Perené, province of Chanchamayo.  Zena is a crop farmer and since becoming a father has worked hard growing coffee, bananas and yucca plant.  Now he has 13 patches of land where he grows these crops in more quantity.  "I worked for ten years with a co-op but now I work for private businesses who want to pay more per kilo for coffe.", he says.  Zenas claims he spends too much on fertilizert because the crops need it twice a year.

That's why his children help out, distributing their time so as not to neglect their other jobs.  His children are now studying but soon will become independent, so Zenas hopes to save a bit of money to live quietly with his wife and not have to work too hard.  This is his first loan through MFP and he is committed to pay it back on time.  "La Bella Durmiente" (Sleeping Beauty) is the name of his communal bank.  He says he will be persistent and participatory in the group's activities.  He plans to use the loan to buy sacks of fertilizer which cost between 120 and 130 PEN.  He wants to buy 10 sacks.

loans.use: To buy 10 sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria es socia del Banco Comunal Llamkasum, es feriante y lleva abarrotes, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 12 años, siente que ha progresado, en todo este tiempo aprendió muchas cosas, aprendió valores como la puntualidad, la responsabilidad, y lo mas importante le enseñaron a tener una buena administración en su negocio, toda las enseñanzas lo transmite a sus hijos, recuerda que con mucho esfuerzo empezó, pero Finca le ayuda a no desmayar y seguir adelante, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes, lo que desea es poder seguir ahorrando para poder comprar un camión.
texts.en:
Victoria is a member of the communal bank Llamkasum.  She travels and sells groceries and has been a member of Finca Perú for 12 years.  She feels like she has progressed and learned many things in all this time, such as values like punctuality and responsibility, but most importantly how to apply good business administration.  She is passing all of her training on to her children.

She remembers how hard it was to get started but Finca helped her not to give up and continue to get ahead.  The loan will be used to buy groceries.  Her goal is to save enough to buy a truck.

loans.use: To purchase sugars, rice, cooking oil, and clothing to sell.

loans.name: Mario Antonio

texts.es:
Mario Antonio es un joven de 21 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Ica, , conocida como “ la tierra del sol Eterno”, ya que siempre se puede disfrutar del sol en cualquier época del año, asimismo también por sus danzas típicas y por la “Laguna de Huacachina” conocida como  “el oasis de América” y sobre todo porque es una ciudad donde los pobladores son muy hospitalarios y generosos, además de ser optimistas ya que a pesar del terremoto sucedido en el año 2007 en el cual muchos pobladores perdieron la vida y quedaron damnificados, los pobladores salieron adelante. El Perú es muy conocido también por su deliciosa comida y uno de los platos favoritos de Mario es la rica “Causa rellena”, Mario solo ha estudiado hasta el quinto año de educación secundaria, debido a que sus padre no tenían los medios económicos suficientes y desde pequeño el tuvo que trabajar para poder colaborar en su casa con los gastos; uno de los pasatiempos de de Mario es Jugar Futbol es una de sus pasiones y el nos comenta que juega muy bien aunque a veces le cometen muchas faltas en el partido por ello.

Mario se dedica actualmente a su trabajo transporte de pasajeros, en  una mototaxi (la cual es alquilada), el trabaja muy duro todos los días ya que tiene que pagar el alquiler de su moto y también tener ingresos para su hogar, por ello el trabaja un alrededor de 10 horas diarias, puede ganar hasta S/. 30 al día, pero cuando son días muy buenos puede ganar hasta s/.60 , el cree que le va bien en su negocio debido a que es muy amable con los clientes, es honesto y sobre todo que tiene un gui que no lo desampara, el cual es Dios.

Mario esta mas que agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a sus ayuda el podrá pagar la inicial para la compra de su mototaxi, con ello podrá tener una mototaxi propia y tener más ingresos, ya que no tendrá que pagar más alquiler y podrá ahorrar aun mas para así poder cumplir su gran sueño:”Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Mario Antonio is a young 21 year old man. He lives in the city of Ica, known as "the land of the eternal sun", since you can enjoy the sun anytime of the year. It is also known for its traditional dances and for the “Laguna de Huacachina”, known as the "oasis of America". Above all, it is a city where the residents are very hospitable and generous, as well as optimistic. Despite the earthquake in 2007, in which many residents lost their lives and their homes, the residents got ahead. Peru is very well known for its delicious food and one of mario's favorite dishes is the delicious “causa rellena”. Mario only went to school to the fifth year of secondary school, since his parents didn't have enough financial resources and he had to work since he was young to help pay expenses. One of Mario's pastimes is to play soccer. It is one of his passions and he tells us that he plays very well although he remarks that he is fouled against a lot in the games because of it.   

Mario works in passenger transportation in a motorcycle taxi, which he rents. He works very hard every day, since he has to pay the rent on his motorcycle and also to make income for his home. To do this he works around 10 hours a day, and he can make up to S/. 30 a day, but on good days he can make up to s/.60. He believes that the business is going well for him because he is friendly to customers, honest and above all, he has a guide that won't fail him, which is God.
