Mario is more than grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help he will be able to make the downpayment on buying a motorcycle taxi. Then he can have his own motorcycle taxi and have more income, since he won't have to pay rent and can save even more to achieve his big dream: "having his own house".

loans.use: to make a down payment on a motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Linder

texts.es:
Linder de 21 años de edad, convive con Mayra con quien tiene a Lincoln de 10 meses de nacido, su único hijo. Ellos viven en una casa propia en la comunidad nativa San Román Bajo en el distrito de Perené, provincia de Chanchamayo. Desde que se enteró que sería padre, Linder se dedica a la agricultura. Es así que siembra café y maíz.  Con el café ha ganado mucha experiencia y ya conoce compradores para su próxima cosecha, que es anual. En cambio, el maíz se cosecha cada 4 meses. Ambos productos los comercializa en la ciudad de Pichanaki.
“El kilo de café lo estoy vendiendo a 11 soles, pero en junio sube hasta 14, me conviene mucho”, afirma.
Linder tiene muchas metas trazadas, su hijo es uno de sus más grandes motores. Quiere seguir trabajando para brindarle un hogar decente, una educación eficiente. Para ello invertirá más en el campo, por que sabe como hacerlo y las ventajas que trae cuidar constantemente sus cultivos.
Piensa alquilar un terreno para sembrar más café, pero eso lo realizará dentro de 1 año. Éste sería su primer préstamo de MFP, por eso se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. A la vez muestra entusiasmo al pertenecer a “La Bella Durmiente”, su banco comunal, del que se siente esperanzado.
Con el dinero del préstamo podrá adquirir bolsas de abonos orgánicos para la renovación (cambio o enriquecimiento de tierras) de una parte de sus sembríos de café.
texts.en:
Linder is 21 years old. He lives with Mayra, with whom he has Lincoln, who is 10 months old, his only child. They live in their own home in the native community of San Román Bajo in the Perené district, province of Chanchamayo. Since he found out that he was going to be a father, Linder has worked in farming. He plants corn and coffee. With the coffee he has gained a lot of experience and he already knows buyers for his next harvest, which is yearly. On the other hand, the corn is harvested every 4 months. Both products are sold in the city of Pichanaki.

“I am selling a kilo of coffee for 11 soles, but in June it goes up to 14, it's very good for me," he affirms. Linder has a lot of goals and his son is his biggest motivation. He wants to keep working to offer him a decent home and an effective education. For that, he will invest more in the field, because he knows how to do it and the advantages that taking care of his crops brings.  

He plans on renting land to plant more coffee, but he will do this within a year. This is his first loan with MFP, and he is committed to making his payments on time. he is enthusiastic about belonging to "La Bella Durmiente" [Sleeping Beauty], his communal bank, which has given him a lot of optimism. With the money from the loan, he will be able to buy bags of organic fertilizer for renovation (change or enrichment of the land) for a part of his coffee crop.

loans.use: to buy bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Mujeres Victoriosas Group

texts.es:
El grupo “Mujeres Victoriosas” es un comité de 18 mujeres que son muy bien organizadas, unidas, trabajadoras y solidarias las unas con otras. Estas señoras son de la ciudad de Villarrica, y todas son vecinas y amigas. Ellas siempre hacen reuniones para debatir sobre las cuestiones que puedan surgir. Estas señoras están muy animadas para seguir participando en este programa y así ir mejorando sus actividades económicas.
Una de las integrantes es la señora Edita, quien se dedica a las artesanías, ella teje sabanas, edredones, colchas y otros tipos de artículos, los cuales luego vende. Comenta que sus piezas son muy solicitadas, puesto que tiene trabajos muy bellos. Su deseo es que sus artesanías sean reconocidas y de esa forma poder expandirse. Ella se define como una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que se esfuerza por darle lo mejor a su familia.
Ella solicita la ayuda de fundación paraguaya y de Kiva para la compra de hilos, agujas, tintes y demás insumos que utilizará para elaborar sus artesanías. Agradece por la oportunidad que estas le dan.
texts.en:
The “Mujeres Victoriosas” (Victorious Women) communal bank is comprised of 18 well-organized, united, and hard-working women who are supportive of each other.  These women are from the city of Villarrica, and they are all neighbors and friends.  They always have meetings in order to discuss the issues that may come up.

These women are very interested in continuing their participation in this program.  That way they will be improving their business activities.

Edita is one of the members.  She devotes herself to handicrafts.  She embroiders sheets and knits quilts, comforters, and other items that she later sells.  She says the things she makes are very popular because her work is very beautiful.

Her wish is for her handicrafts to be recognized so that she is able to expand.  She is known to be a very hard-working and tenacious person who puts forth great effort to give her family the best.

She is requesting help from the Fundación Paraguaya and from Kiva to buy thread, needles, dye, and the other supplies that she will use to make her handicrafts.  She is grateful for the opportunity that they are giving her.

loans.use: to buy thread, needles, dye, and the other supplies that she will use to make her handicrafts.

loans.name: Josefa Petrona

texts.es: Josefa Petrona tiene 40años de edad, su actividad económica es la venta de repuestos de bicicleta, el negocio lo tiene establecido en su casa de habitación donde ya tiene sus clientes fijos y eventuales que llegan para que le brinde el servicio. Este negocio que ahora esta cargo Josefa anteriormente lo tenía sus esposos pero el encontró trabajo en una empresa y ella se hizo cargo del negocio y junto a sus hijos lo han sacado adelante. Josefa esta solicitando crédito para comprar repuestos de bicicleta entre otros productos y aumentar su inventario.
texts.en: Josefa Petrona is 40 years old and works selling spare bicycle parts.  She has her business set up in her house and she already has both regular and occasional customers whom she serves.  Josefa’s husband used to run this business but he got a job at a company and she took over.  Together with her children, she has gotten the business ahead.  Josefa is requesting this loan to buy spare bicycle parts and other items in order to increase her inventory.

loans.use: to buy spare bicycle parts.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es:
Noemí de 27 años de edad, convive con Fredy con quien tiene 2 hijos de 6 y 3 años. Esta familia vive en un hogar propio en la comunidad nativa San Román Bajo en el distrito de Perené, provincia de Chanchamayo. Noemí es una mujer que trabaja sin descanso. Su anhelo de superación por el bienestar de su familia es su motor principal. 
Es así que, en su 3 parcelas de terrenos de cultivo siembra café, maíz y piña. Una vez cosechado traslada sus productos hacia la ciudad de Pichanaki ó Santa Ana, ahí vende los frutos de sus cosechas a compradores que se llevan en grandes cantidades. 
En el trabajo recibe la ayuda de Fredy quien además de cuidar su hogar, destina parte de su tiempo a las labores del campo. Noemí anhela comprarse más terrenos para aumentar su producción. Y de esa manera piensa brindarles a sus hijos la educación y una calidad de vida adecuada. Éste sería el primer préstamo que Noemi obtendría de MFP. Se siente emocionada por eso. Ahora forma parte del banco comunal “La Bella Durmiente”, del que se muestra esperanzada. Con el dinero podrá comprar bolsas de abonos orgánicos para esparcirlos en su café, maíz y piña.
texts.en:
Noemí, age 27, lives with Fredy, with whom she has 2 children ages 6 and 3. The family lives in their own house in their hometown of San Román Bajo, in the district of Perené of the Chanchamayo province. Noemí is a woman who works nonstop. Her main motivation is her family's well-being and her wish to see them get ahead. 
In her 3 plots of land, she cultivates coffee beans, corn, and pineapples. Once harvested, she transports her produce to the either the city of Pichanaki or the city of Santa Ana, where she sells her produce to buyers who purchase in bulk. At work, she gets help from Fredy, who, besides taking care of the household, also sets aside some of his time to work in the fields. Noemí hopes to purchase more plots of land in order to increase production, which is how she plans to provide her children with an education and an adequate quality of life. This will be her first loan from MFP, and she feels excited about it. She is now a member of the "La Bella Durmiente" (Sleeping Beauty) communal bank, and she feels hopeful. With this loan, she will purchase sacks of organic fertilizer to use on her coffee bean, corn, and pineapple crops.

loans.use: to purchase sack of organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Dino

texts.es:
El socio Dino pertenece al banco comunal "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Calca perteneciente al departamento de Cusco, a una hora de la ciudad del Cusco.

El socio tiene 36 años de edad y es conviviente, la socia tiene 3 hijos de 17, 14, 3 años de edad; El socio trabaja en la municipalidad de Calca, el socio paralelamente a este se dedica a apoyar a aus conyugue con la cafetería que ambos tienen para mejorar sus ingresos. El socio desea el prestamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para implementar el cafetin. 


El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Dino is a member of Mamacha Asunta de Calca Communal Bank which is located an hour from the city of Cusco in the Calca province and within the Department of Cusco.

He is 36 years old, has a live-in partner, and has three children who are 17, 14 and 3 years old. He works for the municipality of Calca, but also helps his partner with the cafe they own in order to increase their income. He wants the loan to invest in the purchase of supplies to set up the cafe.

Dino is grateful for the loan and promises to make his repayments within the established timeframe.

loans.use: buy supplies to set up his cafe.

loans.name: Marianela

texts.es:
Marianela de 24 años convive con Jean, su pareja con quien tiene 1 hija llamada Sarely. Ellos viven en una casa propia en la comunidad nativa San Román Bajo en el distrito de Perené, provincia de Chanchamayo. Ella trabaja mucho. La agricultura es su vida por que desde niña creció rodeada de plantaciones de café. A eso se dedicaban sus padres y ella, fiel a ese ejemplo también lo hace.
Marianela contenta, comenta que tiene 4 parcelas de terrenos, en ellos siembra solo café. A todos sus cultivos cuida por igual y siempre le ha ido bien en las ventas. Muchas veces, cuando el precio bajaba tenía problemas pero nunca perdía su inversión.  Ella y su pareja trabajan juntos, pero no es suficiente, por ello invierten en la contrata de personal operario para apresurar las jornadas. “Obtengo de 35 a 40 sacos de mis chacras (terrenos). Me va bien”, dice.
Ella tiene planes que los realizará en poco tiempo. Para ello arrendará tierras para aumentar su producción de café, por que es muy rentable. De esa manera brindará a su familia la estabilidad económica que tanto aspira. Sería la primera vez que Marianela accedería a un préstamo de MFP. Se responsabiliza de ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas. Se siente contenta de pertenecer al banco comunal “La Bella Durmiente”.
Con el dinero podrá comprar 7 bolsas de abonos orgánicos y pagará los servicios de los jornaleros para cultivar sus sembríos de café.
texts.en:
Marianela is 24 years old and lives with her partner, Jean, with whom she has a daughter named Sarely. They live in a house that they own in the native community of San Román Bajo, located in the Perené district and the Chanchamayo province. She works a lot and agriculture is her life since she grew up surrounded by coffee plantations. Her parents worked in coffee production and following their example, she does as well.

Marianela is content and she says that she has four parcels of land where she only grows coffee. She cares for all of her crops equally and she has always done well in sales. When prices have fallen, she has had several difficulties but she never lost her investment. She and her partner work together but it is not enough, which is why they hire operations staff to speed up the work. “I get 35-40 sacks from my fields. I do well”, she says.

She has plans for the short term, including renting land to increase her coffee production, as it is very profitable. This way, she will provide her family with the financial support she has been longing for. This will be Marianela’s first loan with MFP and she promises to make her repayments on time. She is happy being a member of La Bella Durmiente Communal Bank.

With this loan, she will be able to buy seven sacks of organic fertilizer and pay the day laborers for working her coffee fields.

loans.use: to buy seven sacks of fertilizer and to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Lidia Sonia

texts.es: Lidia es socia del Banco Comunal Llankasum, tiene 39 años, se dedica a la venta de ropas por mayor y menor en las ferias, es madre de 4 hijos, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 3 años, aprendió a ser puntual y como administrar su negocio, con las capacitaciones que le brindaron, la relación con su familia es mejor porque aprendió como tratar a sus hijos, ahora ella solicita los préstamos lo necesario para su negocio para no sobre- endeudarse, agradece mucho por todo lo aprendido, el préstamo que solicita ahora lo invertirá en la compra de ropa, su deseo es poder tener su empresa.
texts.en:
Lidia is a member of the Llankasum communal bank. She is 39 years old and works selling clothing, both wholesale and retail, at fairs. She has four children and has been a member of FINCA Peru for three years. Lidia has learned to make punctual repayments and to manage her business. With the training she has received, the relationship with her family is better, because she has learned how to look after her children. 

She is now asking to borrow the money she needs for her business, without over-borrowing. She is very grateful for all that she has learned. The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of clothing. Her dream is to have her own company.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Kely

texts.es: Kely es socia del Banco Comunal Llamkasun, es dueña de una Ferretería, es soltera y no tiene hijos, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 4 años, agradece a Finca Perú por todas las enseñanzas que le brindaron, aunque es joven siempre trabajo y se esforzó para poder tener todo lo que tiene, las capitaciones le ayudaron a poder formarse como empresaria, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de fierros y cemento, lo que desea es poder tener una sucursal.
texts.en: Kely is a member of the Community Bank Llamkasum, she owns a hardware shop, she is single and has no children. She has worked with Finca Peru for four years, is thankful to Finca Peru for all the coaching provided, even though she is young, she has always worked hard to get what she wants, the loans helped her to become an entrepreneur, now she wants to invest this credit in buying iron and cement, her wish is to have a franchise.

loans.use: To buy iron and cement for hardware shop

loans.name: Michael  M.

texts.en:
This is 50-year-old Michael.  He is married and has three children aged 19, 16, and 14, all schooling. He has two additional dependents, who live with him. They are his wife's nephews, staying with him for schooling.  

In 2003, Michael established his patient medicine business. He began his business because he wanted to engage in productive activity after he resigned from work and that is his only source of livelihood. Working 7 days a week and 13 hours a day, he earns about Le 750,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000.

 Michael has already received and successfully repaid a loan and now requires a new loan in order to buy Novalgin tabs, Amoxicillin, Dexedrine and Paracetamol. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 400,000. In the future, Michael plans to establish a desk-top publishing center, to build a house and educate his children.   He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy Paracetomal, Amoxicillin, Dexorange, and Novalgin.

loans.name: Eugenio

texts.es:
Eugenio de 19 años, es un joven entusiasta que vive en la casa de sus padres en la comunidad nativa de San Román Bajo en el distrito de Perené, provincia de Chanchamayo. A su corta edad, él ya se desenvuelve con facilidad en los negocios y la agricultura. Gracias a sus padres cuenta con 3 parcelas de terrenos agrícolas. En ellas siembra café, pues es el producto que más ingresos genera en su zona. Cada cosecha está vendiendo como 60 sacos de 70 kilos. No se puede queja, posee ahorros que el permiten darse algunos gustos como joven y a la vez ayuda económicamente a sus padres. Todos los días se dirige a sus sembríos para verificar su crecimiento y limpiarlos de la mala yerba. Comenta que invierte mucho en abonos pero que al fin y al cabo las recompensas son mayores.
Eugenio es visionario y emprendedor. Con los ahorros que tiene y piensa obtener se comprará un motor para generar luz, así empezará otro negocio dentro de su comunidad. Éste sería el primer préstamo que Eugenio obtendría de MFP. Se siente emocionado por eso. Ahora forma parte del banco comunal “La Bella Durmiente”, del que se muestra esperanzado. Con el dinero podrá pagar los servicios de los jornaleros para el macheteo de la mala yerba y adquirir algunas bolsas de abonos.
texts.en:
Eugenio is 19 years old, an enthusiastic youth who lives in his parents' house in the native community of San Roman Bajo, Perene district, Chanchamayo province. At his young age, Eugenio has already developed an ability in business and agriculture. Thanks to his parents, he has 3 parcels of agricultural land on which he plants coffee, the product that generates the most income in his zone. Each harvest he sells around 60 sacks of 70 kilos each. 

Eugenio can't complain; he has savings that permit him to give himself some youthful pleasures and at the same time, help his parents economically. Every day he heads for his fields to check on their progress and pull weeds. He comments that he invests a great deal in fertilizers so that, in the end, the recompense will be larger. Eugenio is a visionary and an enterprising person. With his savings he wants to buy a motor to generate lights and, thereby, begin another business in his community. 

This will be his 1st loan obtained through MFP. He is excited about it. Eugenio has joined “La Bella Durmiente” (The Sleeping Beauty) Communal Bank, with which he has high hopes. With the loan Eugenio will pay day laborers to chop down weeds, and he'll purchase some sacks of fertilizer.

loans.use: to hire day laborers and buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Francis Raiza

texts.es:
La socia Francis pertenece al banco comunal "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Calca perteneciente al departamento de Cusco, a una hora de la ciudad del Cusco.

La socia tiene 39 años de edad y es casada, la socia tiene 3 hijos de 20, 18, 10 años de edad; la socia se dedica  a la cosmetología, la socia también paralelo a este negocio  se dedica  a la elaboracion de tortas, panetones, y tiene su stand en el mercado en el cual expone sus deliciosos pasteles y tortas, la socia es una mujer muy trabajadora y en esta ocasión desea invertir en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de sus tortas y de panetones que a la fecha le siguen pidiendo sus clientas.




La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
This member, Francis, belongs to the communal bank "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA."   The bank is located in the province of Calca, belonging to the department of Cusco, an hour from the city of Cusco.

She is 39 years old and married with 3 children ages 20,18, and 10.  She works in cosmetology and also runs a business making cakes and pastries.  She has a stand in the market in which she displays her delicious cakes and pastries.  This member is a very hard-working woman and on this occasion, she wants to invest in the purchase of supplies for making her cakes and pastries that to this date, her customers continue asking for.

This member is grateful for the loan and promises to complete the payments in the established time.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of supplies for making cakes and pastries that to this date, her customers keep asking for.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes de 29 años es una mujer soltera y sin hijos. Vive con sus padres y hermanos en la comunidad nativa de San Román Bajo, en el distrito de Perené, provincia de Chanchamayo. Mercedes es una mujer independiente. A pesar de vivir en el mismo techo que sus padres, sabe ganarse la vida con su propio esfuerzo. Ella cuenta con 2 parcelas de terrenos de cultivos, en ellos siembra café. En esta actividad necesita la ayuda de personal operario, pues a veces sus hermanos no pueden ayudarla.  La cosecha del café es anual, por eso Mercedes, se dedica a varias actividades como jornalera en otros cultivos, apoyo en el trabajo del hogar, entre otros.
Pero cuando llegan las cosechas sale bien beneficiada ya que la venta de café no tiene pierde. Ya lleva 5 años desempeñándose en el negocio, y ya sabe quienes son los compradores más fieles.
Una de sus metas más cercanas es ampliar sus cultivos, con la siembra de plátanos y yucas. Es así que deberá trabajar y ahorrar. Ésta sería la primera vez que Mercedes obtendría un crédito de MFP, gracias a su ayuda, por tal razón da su palabra de ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas. Se siente emocionada por ser parte del banco comunal “La Bella Durmiente”. Con el dinero del préstamo podrá comprar 8 bolsas de abonos orgánicos para el café, así también pagará al personal quien le ayudará a limpiar sus tierras.
texts.en:
29-year old Mercedes is single and doesn’t have any children. She lives with her parents and siblings in the community of San Román Bajo, Perene District, Chanchamayo Province. Mercedes is an independent woman, who, despite living in the same house as her parents, knows how to earn a living through her own efforts. She has two parcels of farmland where she grows coffee. She needs help with the farm as her siblings cannot always help out. 

Coffee is harvested annually so Mercedes also works as a day labourer on other farms, assists with household chores, as well as taking on other jobs.

But when it is coffee harvest time, all is good as you can’t fail with coffee. Mercedes has been doing this work for five years and already knows who are the best people to sell the coffee to. One of the things she wants to do soon is to sow bananas and yucca in her fields so she can save more money.

This will be Mercedes’ first loan with MFP and she is grateful for the assistance. She gives her word that she will be punctual with the repayments. She is excited to be part of La Bella Durmiente (Sleeping Beauty) Community Bank. With the loan money she plans to buy eight bags of organic fertilizer for the coffee plants and hire labourers to help her weed the fields.

loans.use: to buy eight bags of organic fertilizer and hire labourers

loans.name: Maria Gertrudis

texts.es: Maria Gertrudis tiene 58 años de edad, su negocio que ella tiene es la venta de ropa usada  en el cual ya tiene años de experiencia y sus clientes la buscan por la calidad de ropa que tiene y el servicio que ella les brinda. Este negocio lo inicia como una alternativa de trabajo ya que ella necesitaba apoyar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar. Maria Gertrudis está solicitando crédito para poder invertir en el negocio en la compra de pacas para aumentar su inventario y ofrecerles a sus clientes variedad ropa.
texts.en: María Gertrudis, 58, sells used clothes; she has years’ experience and her customers seek her out because of the quality of the clothes she has and the service she provides.  This business started as a work alternative since she needed to help her husband with household expenses.  María Gertrudis is requesting a loan to invest in the business buying bundles of clothes to increase inventory and have a variety of clothes available to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy bundles of clothes.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
This is 43-year-old Mohamed.  He is married and has four children aged 10, 7, 4, and 2, all schooling. In 2001, Mohamed established his ladies' bags, necklaces, wallets, and cosmetics  business. He began his business because he wanted to avoid being idle and ensure that he is independent, and that is his only source of income. 

Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, he earns about Le 1,250,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000. Mohamed requires a loan in order to buy ladies' bags, men's chain wallets and bracelets. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 400,000.

 In the future, Mohamed plans to increase his capital, build a house, and educate his children.   He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy ladies' bags, men's chain wallets and bracelets.

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
Lorenzo de 57 años está casado con Paulina con quien tiene 4 hijos de 27, 24, 22 y 19 años, todos ellos ya independientes. Lorenzo y Paulina viven solos en una casa propia en la comunidad nativa de San Román Bajo en el distrito de Perené, provincia de Chanchamayo. Hace más de 30 años que Lorenzo se dedica a la agricultura. De esa manera pudo educar a sus 4 hijos. Ahora ellos saben desenvolverse solo en la vida. Lorenzo es un hombre de firmes convicciones y valores marcados. Sabe que con responsabilidad y constancia los objetivos se pueden lograr. Cuenta con 4 lotes de terrenos de cultivos, en ellos siembra café, y muy pocas veces yucas, pero solo para consumo personal. Sus extensiones de terrenos son considerables, por eso requiere la ayuda de jornaleros para apresurar el trabajo. Cunado sus hijos disponen de tiempo apoyan en las jornadas, es por eso que Lorenzo se siente orgullo se sus hijos. Toda su producción la vende con éxito a compradores quienes ya lo conocen, así que no se preocupa por eso. Él continuará con el trabajo del campo por que es lo que le gusta hacer.  Éste sería su primer préstamo de MFP, por eso se responsabiliza de ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. “La Bella Durmiente”, es el nombre de su reciente grupo comunal, del que confía para lograr sus metas.
Lorenzo fertiliza cada semestre su cafetal, por eso de recibir el dinero comprará bolsas de fertilizantes orgánicos.
texts.en:
Lorenzo, 57, is married to Paulina and they have four children who are 27, 24, 22 and 19 years old; all are independent.  Lorenzo and Paulina live alone in their own house in the indigenous community of San Román Bajo in Perené District, Chanchamayo Province.  He’s been a farmer for more than 30 years and this is how he was able to educate his four children.   Now they know how to manage for themselves in life.  

Lorenzo is a man of firm convictions and marked values.  He knows that with responsibility and constancy objectives can be reached.  He owns four parcels of farmland that he grows coffee on and occasionally cassava but only for personal consumption.  His farmland is extensive so he needs to hire day laborers to quicken the work.  When his children have free time they help out with the work and this is why Lorenzo is so proud of them.  He sells his entire production to buyers who know him so he doesn’t worry about that.  He will continue working in the fields which is the work he likes to do.

This will be his first MFP loan and he will be responsible about being punctual with monthly payments.  The name of his communal bank is “La Bella Durmiente” (Sleeping Beauty) that he trusts to reach his goals.  Lorenzo fertilizes his coffee plants every six months so that’s why he needs to get money to buy sacks of organic fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Omar

texts.es:
El socio Omar pertenece al banco comunal "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Calca perteneciente al departamento de Cusco, a una hora de la ciudad del Cusco.

El sociotiene 30 años de edad y es casado, la socia tiene 1 hijo de 6 años de edad; El socio tarabaja en el ministerio de salud y paralelo a este trabajo en socio comparte con su conyugue la atención de sus propia tienda de abarrotes, el socio  desea invertir en la mercadería el socio comprara arroz, azucar, harina, leche al por mayor. El socio solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de arroz, azucar, harinas, fideos.

El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Omar belongs to the “Mamacha Asunta de Calca” communal bank located in Calca Province belonging to Cusco Department an hour away from the city of Cusco.  He is 30 years old, married and has a six-year-old son.

He works for the Ministry of Health but also runs a grocery store that he owns with his wife.  He wants to invest in merchandise and will buy rice, sugar, flour and milk at wholesale.  He requests the loan to buy rice, sugar, flour and noodles.

He is grateful for the loan and commits to make his installment payments according to the established timeline.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, flour and noodles.

loans.name: Maruja

texts.es:
Maruja de 42 años de edad, es una mujer separada. Tiene 8 hijos, el mayor tiene 18 años y el menor 6. Maruja vive con 5 de ellos en una casa propia en la comunidad nativa San Román Bajo, del distrito de Perené en la provincia de Chanchamayo. Maruja creció en el campo. Vio a sus padres trabajar la tierra y por eso aprendió a desenvolverse con facilidad en sus propios terrenos. Ahora ella cuenta con 3 parcelas de terrenos cultivables, ahí siembra café. Este producto es muy bien cuidado por ella y sus hijos. Ellos distribuyen su tiempo para dedicarse a la limpieza, abonamiento, y cosecha de sus cultivos.
Cuando es época de cosecha el trabajo es más intenso y tiene que contratar personal para apresurarlo. Una vez cosechado, traslada sus productos hacia la ciudad de Pichanaki y los ofrece por kilos, latas o cajones. Ahí los compradores ya la conocen.
“De mis 3 chacras tengo 8 sacos de café de 80 kilos mas o menos y lo vendo a compradores particulares y si no los encuentro, lo llevo a una cooperativa que siempre compra”, comenta. 
Ella está contenta y espera multiplicar su producción, para ello deberá alquilar o comprar terrenos. Esas son sus metas más próximas. Sería la primera vez que Maruja obtendría un préstamo de MFP, por eso manifiesta ser responsable con el pago de las cuotas. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “La Bella Durmiente”, del que se siente contenta y esperanzada. De obtener el dinero podrá contratar el personal necesario para que limpien, fertilicen y cosechen sus cafetales.
texts.en:
Maruja is 42 years old and she is separated. She has eight children; the eldest is 18 years old and the youngest is six. Maruja lives with five of her children in her own house in the indigenous community of San Román Bajo de Perené in the province of Chanchamayo. Maruja grew up in the countryside. She saw her parents working the land and so she learned to manage her own land very easily. She now has three plots of arable land, where she grows coffee. The crop is very well looked after by her and her children. They divide their time between weeding, fertilizing and harvesting the crop.

During harvesting time, the work is more intense, so Maruja has to take on workers to speed things up. Once harvested, the produce is transported to Pichanaki city and sold by the kilogram, in cans or in crates. The buyers there all know Maruja.

"From my three farms I get eight sacks of coffee of about 80 kg and I sell to private buyers, but if I don't find them, I take the coffee to a cooperative that always buys it," she says.

She is happy and hopes to increase her production; in order to do this she must rent or buy more land. That is her next goal. This will be the first time that Maruja has had a loan from MFP, so she is showing herself to be responsible for the repayments. She belongs to the "La Bella Durmiente" communal bank, which she feels happy and hopeful about. By obtaining this money, she will be able to hire the workers necessary to weed, fertilize and harvest her coffee plantations.

loans.use: to take on day laborers.

loans.name: Ediatu

texts.en:
This is 35-year-old Ediatu.  She is married and has two children aged 14 (in SSS 1) and 4 (in preschool). She has no additional dependents living with her.  

In 2004, Ediatu established her restaurant business. She began this business after she dropped out of school and started assisting her mother. Working 7 days a week and 8 hours a day, she earns about Le 616,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,500,000 to buy her stock in large quantity which will increase her profit.  

In the future, Ediatu plans to construct a modernized building that will house her restaurant. She thanks you for your support

loans.use: To buy palm oil, rice, Maggi, onions and other cooking condiments.

loans.name: Florinda

texts.es:
Florinda es socia del Banco Comunal Imperio, tiene 58 años, ella tiene una empresa de confección de tapices, que lo envía a Cusco, es madre de 2 hijos, es casada y socia de Finca Perú desde  hace 6 años, ella aprendió a ser puntual, y la responsabilidad en su empresa, empezó poco a poco, ahora viendo su negocio creciendo se siente satisfecha con todo lo que pudo lograr, y eso es gracias a todo el esfuerzo que le puso. 
Con el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de hilos para los tapices.
texts.en:
Florinda is a member of the Imperio Community Bank. She is 58 years old and runs a business making tapestries which she sends to Cusco. She has two children, is married, and has been a member of Finca Perú for six years. She has learned to be punctual and responsible. Florinda began slowly, and now she sees her business growing. She feels very satisfied with all that she’s managed to achieve--all of it due to the effort that she put in.

With the loan she is seeking, she plans to buy thread for the tapestries.

loans.use: to buy thread for tapestries

loans.name: Reynilda

texts.es: Reynilda es socia del Banco Comunal Imperio, tiene 42 años, es dueña de una Ferretería y va a las ferias llevando queso, es madre de 2 hijos. Con las capacitaciones aprendió mucho acerca de como administrar su negocio, agradece a Finca Perú por el apoyo a las mujeres que mas lo necesitan, Finca para ella es mas que una Asociación, es como el lugar donde ella puede acudir cuando mas lo necesita, se siente muy bien cuando va a sus reuniones de banco comunal, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra chapas y cables.
texts.en: Reynilda is a member of the communal bank Imperio.  She is 42 years old and the mother of 2 children.  She's the owner of a hardware store and goes to the markets selling cheese.  With the trainings, she learned a lot about how to run her business and she thanks Finca Perú for supporting the women who most need it.  For her, Finca is more than an association, it is like a place where she can go when she most needs it.  She feels very good when she goes to the communal bank meetings.  Now, with the loan she will invest in the purchase of sheet metal and cables.

loans.use: to purchase sheet metal and cables.

loans.name: Amadu

texts.en: This is 51-year-old Amadu.  He is married and has 2 children, aged 8 years (in the second grade) and 5 years. He has no additional dependents. In 1991, Amadu established his provisions business. He began his business at an early age as he is not educated. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, he earns about SLL 450,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of SLL 3,000,000 to increase his stocks in order to meet the needs of his customers. He intends to establish a bigger store to compete with the nearby businesses owned by Lebanese nationals.

loans.use: To buy provisions for his store.

loans.name: Hermelinda

texts.es:
Hermelinda de 39 años de edad, convive con Alfonso con quien tiene 6 hijos pero vive con 5 de ellos, la menor tiene 7 años. Está familia habita un hogar propio en la comunidad nativa de San Román Bajo, en el distrito de Perené, provincia de Chanchamayo. Hermelinda es una mujer que predica con el ejemplo. Trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia. Con la ayuda de Alfonso se dedican a la agricultura. Siembran principalmente café en sus 3 lotes de terrenos. “El café es más rentable que cualquier otro producto, el kilo lo vendo a 12 soles”, comenta. 
Y como ya lleva mucho tiempo en esta actividad está asociada a una cooperativa, la que recibe su producción al instante. Para que los granos sean buenos, ella tiene que invertir en abonos constantemente y los cuidados como son: el macheteo, el cultivo, la limpieza de las hojas de las arañas, el podo, etc. En esa labor la ayudan sus hijos y su esposo. Pero la época de cosecha es más intensa por eso contrata personal adicional, a quien paga diariamente. Éste sería el primer préstamo que Hermelinda obtendría de MFP. Se siente emocionada por eso. Ahora forma parte del banco comunal “La Bella Durmiente”, del que se muestra esperanzada.
De obtener el dinero podrá invertir en la compra de bolsas de abonos y para pagar a los jornaleros quienes trasplantarán el café en otras tierras.
texts.en:
Hermelinda, age 39, lives with Alfonso, with whom she has 6 children; however, she lives with only 5 of them, the youngest of whom is 7 years old. This family owns a house in their hometown of San Román Bajo, in the district of Perené of the Chanchamayo province. Hermelinda is a woman who practices what she preaches. She works very hard in order to help her family get ahead. With Alfonso's help, she works in agriculture. They mainly grow coffee beans in their 3 plots. "Coffee is more lucrative than any other crop. I sell the kilo at 12 PEN," she comments.

Since she has been in agriculture for a long time, she belongs to a cooperative, which instantly receives her crops. In order to get good beans, she needs to constantly invest in fertilizer, and to perform tasks such as: cutting, cultivating, pruning, cleaning the leaves and getting rid of the spiders, etc. Her children and husband help her with these duties. However, the harvest is the most intense period, which is why she hires additional help whom she pays daily. This will be Hermelinda's first loan from MFP, and she feels excited about it. She is now a member of the "La Bella Durmiente" (Sleeping Beauty) communal bank, and she feels hopeful.

Upon receiving the money, she will be able to invest it in purchasing sacks of fertilizer, and in paying the day laborers who will transplant the coffee plants to other fields.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fertilizer and hire day laborers.

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es: Felicita es socia del Banco Comunal Imperio, tiene 53 años, ella tiene una tienda de maquinarias pesadas, es madre de 5 hijos, es viuda. Desde que entro a Finca Perú su vida ha cambiado por todas las cosas que pudo aprender, para su negocio como para su hogar , con mucho esfuerzo pudo sacar adelante a su familia, las capacitaciones que recibió en su Banco Comunal le ayudaron mucho a todo lo que ha podido lograr, da gracias porque le ayudaron cuando ella mas lo necesitaba, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de taladros.
texts.en: Felicita is a member of the Imperio Communal Bank. She is 53 years old and owns a store that sells heavy machinery. She is a widowed mother of five. Since she became a part of Finca Perú, her life has changed because of all the things she has learned both for her business and for her home. With great effort, she has been able to help her family get ahead. The training that she has received from her bank has helped her achieve a lot, and she is grateful because the group helped her when she needed it most. Now she will invest this loan in purchasing drills.

loans.use: to purchase drills.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en: This is 28 year-old Ibrahim.  He is single and has no children and no dependents. In 2006, just after he completed his computer studies, Ibrahim established his computer accessories and repair business. Working 6 days a week and 12 hours a day, he earns about SLL 800,000 in profits every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of SLL 3,000,000, which he intends to invest in his computer business in hopes of increasing his monthly profits to SLL 1,100,000. His major challenge is that the shop he now occupies cannot accommodate his stock. He intends to further his studies to the degree level and to establish an information technology training center. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To purchase computer accessories for his business.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es:
Eduardo de 28 años, es un padre soltero, su hijo Juan David de 6 años, es su mayor tesoro. Hace 3 años que se separó de la madre de su hijo. Él vive con sus  hermanos en la casa de sus padres en la comunidad nativa San Román Bajo, en el distrito de Perené, provincia de Chanchamayo. Eduardo se dedica a la agricultura hace 1 año. Es por eso que la primera cosecha que obtuvo le otorgó 10 sacos. “Las plantas nuevas votan pocos granos, cuando pasan los años y con los abonos, producen más”, comenta confiado en que el próximo mes de mayo a julio cosechará como 20 sacos. Así también piensa iniciar una siembra de plátanos, cuyos frutos son recogidos en cada quincena, es decir 2 veces al mes. Para eso deberá invertir en la compra de mamones de plátanos. Cuenta con una parcela y media de café, y otro lote de terreno que aún no produce, es por eso que el plátano tendrá un lugar privilegiado.
Una de sus metas es construir su casa propia, así se independizará de su familia. De esa manera podrá brindarle a su hijo mejores condiciones de vida. Éste sería su primer préstamo de MFP, por eso se responsabiliza de ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. “La Bella Durmiente”, es el nombre de su reciente grupo comunal, del que confía para lograr sus metas. De recibir el dinero, comprará 7 bolsas de abonos y mamones de plátanos para iniciar otra siembra.
texts.en:
Eduardo is a 28-year-old single father whose son, six-year-old Juan David, is his biggest treasure. Eduardo separated from Juan David's mother three years ago. He lives with his siblings at his parents' house in his hometown of San Román Bajo, in the district of Perené of the Chanchamayo province. Eduardo has been in agriculture for a year, which is why his first harvest yielded only 10 sacks of coffee beans. "Young plants give out few beans. As the years pass and with the help of fertilizer, the plants produce more," he states, confident that next July he will harvest 20 sacks. He is also planning to start growing plantains, which are harvested bi-weekly, that is, twice a month. In order to do so, he must invest in purchasing plantain plants. He has a plot and a half of coffee crop, and another plot that is fallow, which means that the plantains will have a privileged place on which to grow.

One of his goals is to build his own house, that way, he will become independent from his family. In so doing, he will be able to provide his son with better living conditions. This will be his first loan from MFP, which is why he commits to being punctual in making his monthly payments. The name of his communal bank is "La Bella Durmiente" (Sleeping Beauty), and he trusts this group to achieve his goals. Upon receiving the money, he will purchase 7 sacks of fertilizer, and plantain plants to start with his second crop.

loans.use: to purchase 7 sacks of fertilizer, and plantain plants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana es socia del Banco Comunal Imperio, tiene 53 años, tiene una Fabrica de ladrillos, es madre de 7 hijos, es socia de Finca Peru desde hace 12 años, todo este tiempo le enseñaron a ser puntual, administrar el dinero y ser mas responsable, agradece a Finca que pudo hacer su casa, por este tiempo de lluvia le va mas o menos pero trata de mantener sus clientes, las capacitaciones le encantan porque pudo aprender mucho de ellas, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de ladrillos hecho para quemar.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the "Imperio" communal bank. She is 53, and the mother of seven children. She has a brick-making business. She has been a member of Finca Perú for 12 years.  

All this time, they taught her to be on time with payments, to manage the money, and to be responsible. She is grateful to Finca that she was able to build her house. 

Because it is the rainy season, her business is going "so-so", but she is trying to keep her customers. She loves the training sessions, because she was able to learn a lot from them. 

Now she will use the loan to buy bricks ready for firing.

loans.use: To buy bricks ready for firing.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es: El señor Concepción, es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe, junto a su esposa la cual labora como comerciante , para apoyarle con los gastos del hogar ; ya que ellos tienen hijos a su cargo , los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condición es de vida y apoyar en sus estudios a sus hijos , don Concepción desde hace muchos años  trabaja en una empresa privada , pero no cuenta con el suficiente sueldo para ir mejorando su humilde vivienda , ya que el solicita el apoyo de Afodenic atravez de los fondos kiva para realizar un anexo de un pequeño cuarto para una de hijas, para que goce de privacidad siendo adolecente y necesita de su propio espacio , ya que donde actualmente duermen están todos en el mismo cuarto .Agradece mucho estos programas que para personas de escasos recursos le cambian la vida poco a poco .
texts.en:
Concepción lives with his wife in the municipality of Ticuantepe. She has a small business in order to help him with the household expenses, as they have children in their care. Their plan is to improve their family's living conditions, and support their children with their education. 

Concepción has been working at a private company for many years, but he doesn't earn enough salary to keep improving his modest home. 

So he is applying for support from Afodenic through Kiva funding, to undertake the addition of a small room for one of his daughters, so that she can enjoy privacy. She is a teenager, and needs her own space; as where they currently sleep, everyone is in the same room. 

He is very thankful for these programs, which change life little by little for people with limited resources.

loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Alan Eduardo

texts.es:
El señor Alan Eduardo es casado,  tiene 22 años de edad, cursó los grado de educación diversificada, tiene 1 hijo, se dedica a la prestación de servicios de transporte a estudiantes del lugar donde vive hacia otros lugares de nuestro país, inició este negocio con el apoyo de su padre y hasta el momento lleva 4 años de experiencia.

solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para tapizar su vehículo, para ofrecer mejor comodidad a sus cliente, y como también dar un servicio completo a su vehículo, quiere seguir mejorando y tener una buena productividad.
texts.en:
Alan Eduardo is 22 years old and married.  He has a high school education, and he has one child.

He devotes himself to transportation services for students from where he lives to other places in our country.  He started this business with the support of his father.  So far he has four years of experience.

He is requesting a loan to upholster his vehicle, which will make his customers more comfortable.  He will also have complete maintenance done on his vehicle.  He wants to continue improving and have good productivity.

loans.use: to improve his vehicle's condition for his customers.

loans.name: Veronica Saida

texts.es:
La señora Veronica es una mujer que se gana la vida vendiendo abarrotes, esto le permite poder cuidar y velar por sus dos pequeños hijos uno de 3 y el otro de 14, este apoyo y determinación constante le han permitido poder salir adelante sola, actualmente ella está separada de su esposo por discrepancias personales. Esta pequeña y humilde familia vive en la ciudad de Camaná, ubicada al sur del país y caracterizada por los deliciosos platos marinos que brinda, como prueba de ello la señora Veronica considera que el “Chupe de Camarones” es el mejor de todos y por ello lo ha elegido como su plato de comida favorita.

A ella le hubiese podido estudiar Contabilidad como carrera profesional, pero por la escases de dinero y otros motivos ella no pudo lograr esta carrera, sin embargo esto no la detuvo y es así como decidió poner un negocio y recibir los ingresos necesarios para la mantención de su familia, ella trabaja arduamente todo el día en promedio 13 horas y con este tiempo acumulado puede ganar hasta S/.120, lo que le sirve para poder pagar los gastos diarios y juntar dinero para comprar más mercadería.

Veronica necesita ayuda debido a que no tiene un capital fuerte para poder comprar mercadería de verano a un menor precio y así poder adquirir un mayor margen de ganancia, con estos nuevos y constantes ingresos ella se ha trazado como meta comprarse una congeladora y con el paso de tiempo, mucha dedicación y esfuerzo ella podrá comprar un terreno para construir allí su vivienda propia.
texts.en:
Verónica is a woman who earns her livelihood selling groceries.  This allows her to watch over and care for her two small children who are 3 and 14 years old.  This constant support and determination have allowed her to get ahead alone.  She is currently separated from her husband due to personal differences.  This small, humble family lives in the city of Camaná located in the south of the country and noted for the delicious seafood it produces.  As proof of this, Verónica deems “Chupe de Camarones” to be the best one of all and that’s why she chose it as her favorite dish.

She would have liked to study accounting as a professional career but because of lack of money and for other reasons she wasn’t able to have this career.  However, this did not deter her and she decided to open a business to earn the necessary income to support her family.  She works hard all day on average 13 hours and in all that accumulated time is able to earn up to 120 soles which she can use to cover daily expenses and to save a bit of money to buy more merchandise.

Verónica needs help because she does not have strong capital to be able to buy summer merchandise at a lower price to earn a larger profit margin.  With this new and constant income she has set a goal for herself of buying a freezer and in time with much effort and dedication she’ll be able to buy a piece of land to build her own house on.

loans.use: to buy summer merchandise.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia Luz Marina pertenece al banco comunal "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Calca perteneciente al departamento de Cusco, a una hora de la ciudad del Cusco.

La socia tiene 43 años de edad y es soltera, la socia tiene 3 hijos de 24, 22, 5 años de edad; la socia tiene su cafetin el cual lo implementa con diferentes tes filtrantes, con pastelitos, con cafe, chocolates, con sandwich, hamburguezas, gaseosas, helados entre otros snack. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la cmopra de insumos para implementar el cafetin.


La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Luz Marina belongs to the “Mamacha Asunta de Calca” communal bank located in Calca Province belonging to Cusco Department an hour away from the city of Cusco.  She is 43 years old, single and has three children who are 24, 22 and 5 years old.  

She has a snack bar that she stocks with assorted teas, pastries, coffee, chocolates, sandwiches, hamburgers, soft-drinks and ice-cream, among other snacks.  She needs the loan to buy supplies to stock her café.  She is grateful for the loan and commits to make her installment payments in the established time.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her snack bar.

loans.name: Abrahan Antonio

texts.es: El joven Abrahán, es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe, junto a su esposa, ella le apoya con algunos gastos del hogar ya que tienen hijos a su cargos  y se le hace muy difícil trabajar solamente uno de ellos, Abrahán tiene mucho tiempo de laborar en una empresa privada del mismo municipio, la mayor preocupación es no poder ganar lo suficiente y terminar de construir su vivienda ya que tuvo que poner sabanas , zinc , tablas muy viejas para cerrar una pared del hogar , se encuentra en una situación muy difícil ya que esta a la voluntad de Dios que no se metan a robar los pocos electrodomésticos que con muchos esfuerzos a logrado comprar . El financiamiento lo necesita para la comprar de zinc, bloques , cemento , perlines , entro otros materiales para realizar la pared y gozar de un mejor bienestar .
texts.en: Abrahán lives in Ticuantepe with his wife.  She helps him out with some of the household expenses since they have children in their care and it’s difficult if only one of them works.  Abrahán has been working for a private firm in the same town for a long time.  His greatest concern is not being able to earn enough to finish building his house since he had to use bed sheets, metal sheeting and very old boards to close off one of the house’s walls.  He finds himself in a very difficult position in that it’s only God’s will that keeps the few appliances he’s acquired with so much effort from being stolen.  He needs the loan to buy metal sheeting, concrete blocks, cement and purlins, among other supplies to build the wall and enjoy better wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
La socia Maribel pertenece al banco comunal "MAMACHA ASUNTA DE CALCA"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Calca perteneciente al departamento de Cusco, a una hora de la ciudad del Cusco.

La socia tiene 34 años de edad y es conviviente, la socia tiene 2 hijos de 14, 3 años de edad; la socia se dedica a la atencion de su cafetin la socia tiene su negocio escolar en el colegio y en esta ocasión desea implementar el cafetin en el colegio porque comenzaran la vacaciones utiles y ella brindara el servicio de cafetin, la socia desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de gaseosas, de snack, de galletas, queso, huevos para los sandwich y otros productos.
 

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Maribel belongs to the “Mamacha Asunta de Calca” communal bank located in Calca Province belonging to Cusco Department an hour away from the city of Cusco.  She is 34 years old, has a spouse and two children who are 14 and 3 years old.

She has a snack bar at a school and on this occasion wants to stock the school café because vacation is about to start and she will provide snack bar services.  She wants to use the loan to buy soft-drinks, snacks, cookies, cheese, eggs for sandwiches and other products.  She is grateful for the loan and commits to make her installment payments on time.

loans.use: to buy soft-drinks, snacks, cookies, cheese, eggs and other products.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
El señor Jose Santos es casado, tiene 38 años de edad, cursó los 5 años de educación primaria, tiene 2 hijos 1 de los cuales esta estudiando,se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa casual para hombre y mujeres, inició este negocio por iniciativa propia y hasta el momento lleva 2 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica al mismo oficio.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderías, y mejorar sus ventas, espera tener en el futuro un negocio prospero.
texts.en: José Santos, 38, is married and completed five years of elementary school.  He has two children one of which attends school.  He is a merchant; he sells casual clothes for men and women.  He started the business on his own initiative and to date has two years’ experience.  His wife who is in the same line of work supports his efforts.  He’s asking for a loan to buy merchandise and improve his sales; he hopes to have a prosperous business in the future.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Mutale

texts.en:
Mutale is a 21-year-old entrepreneur who owns his own mobile money shop in Lusaka. He comes from a family of ten and recently completed his senior high school education. At his shop, Mutale offers money transfers and transaction account opening (a small scale banking system). All these transactions are done using mobile phones and are faster and easier to access. 

The main challenge Mutale faces is the availability of shop space and this is what he sees as the biggest hindrance to his business expansion. Previously he catered to 700 customers, but now this number has increased to 1,000. When he gets the Kiva loan, he intends to open three more shops to cater for the ever expanding customer base. 

His biggest dream is to reach out to the rural areas of the country because mobile telecommunication is now available country-wide, and since all his transactions are done using the mobile phone, he wants to take advantage of the prevailing situation to reach out to a bigger and more varied customer base. He also intends to use the proceeds from the expansion to pay for his way through college and also help his siblings complete their education. Currently he's the only breadwinner in the family. (His whole family depends on him to provide financially.) 

In the video, Mutale is being interviewed by a representative from Mobile Transactions (MTZL).

loans.use: To increase his shop space and pay for his college tuition

loans.name: Senayda Elisa

texts.es:
la joven Senayda tiene 27 años de edad, vive en la colonia Arias y se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, como ser: frijoles, arroz, pan, cafe, refrescos, churros, jugos, papel higienico, carnes, queso, mantequilla, quesillo, leche, candelas, manteca, aceite, margarina y muchos otros productos, Senayda  es una persona muy trabajadora y dedicada a su familia, es madre de dos hijos,  cuenta  con la ayuda  de   su  esposo para cubrir los gastos del hogar.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria, granos basicos, carnes y lacteos, desea tener surtida su pulperia.
en sus tiempos libres Senayda visita la Iglesia.
las ganancias las necesita para darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en: Senayda, 27, lives in the Arias neighborhood and sells basic staple items like: beans, rice, bread, coffee, soft-drinks, snacks, juices, toilet paper, meats, cheese, butter, cheese, milk, candles, lard, oil, margarine and many other products.  Senayda is a very hard working person who is devoted to her family.  She’s the mother of two children and her husband helps her cover household expenses.  She will use the loan to buy groceries, basic grains, meats and dairy products; she wants her grocery store to be well-stocked.  In her free time Senayda goes to church.  She needs the profits to give her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Jorge Miguel

texts.es: El Joven Jorge tiene 23 años de edad, es soltero y tiene un hijo de 2 años el cual vive con su mama junto a su papa, en la zona Oroncota.  El Joven Jorge se dedica al comercio de tarjetas de crédito para celular al por menor el  vende en el mercado central de Cochabamba y de la localidad de Sacaba, e forma  ambulante, actividad donde le va muy bien, no tiene puesto fijo, per le gustaría a la larga tener un puesto y surtir no solo de tarjetas sino también de repuestos de celulares. El joven Jorge vende todos los días y también estudia en un instituto, y esta es la única actividad que le permite mantenerse y pagar sus estudios, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de tarjetas al por mayor, el joven Jorge se siente feliz y agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindan para crecer en su negocio y la de mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Jorge, 23, is single and has a two-year-old son who lives with his mother and father in the Oroncota zone.  Jorge sells mobile phone cards in Cochabamba’s central market and in Sacaba and as a street vendor.  He does very well in this activity.  Since he does not have a fixed stand, in the long run he’d like to have one and stock not only phone cards but spare parts for mobile phones.  Jorge sells every day and is also attending an institute and this is the only activity that allows him to support himself and pay for his schooling.  He will use the loan money to buy cards at wholesale.  Jorge feels very happy and grateful for the opportunity he’s being given to grow in business and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy mobile phone cards.

loans.name: Mujeres De Confianza Group

texts.es: El Banco Comunal está conformado por 9 integrantes en el cual no es la primera vez que están solicitando crédito este grupo se mantiene unido desde que se formaron, ellos mismo se apoyan y se motivan para salir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida y sobre todo en cada uno de los negocios que tienen cada uno de ellos. Lisbeth es parte de este grupo en cual su actividad económica a la que se dedica es a una pulpería y está solicitando crédito para invertir en el negocio en la compra de granos básicos, aceite, shampoo, detergente entre otros productos que demanda sus clientes.
texts.en:
The communal bank has nine members and this isn’t the first time they’ve requested credit.  The group has stayed together since it was formed.  They themselves support and motivate each other to get ahead and improve their quality of life especially in each of their businesses.  

Lizbeth is part of this group and her economic activity is a grocery store.  She’s asking for this loan to invest in the business buying basic grains, oil, shampoo and detergent, among other products her customers require.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, oil, shampoo and detergent, among other products.

loans.name: Wilson De Jesus

texts.es: El señor Wilson de Jesús es un hombre que salió de su municipio en busca de una mejor alternativa de vida, pues hace algún tiempo se trasladó hacia el municipio de marinilla, al oriente del departamento de Antioquia, donde vio la agricultura como su posible fuente de ingresos; allí aprendió esta actividad y desde entonces esta ha sido su fuente de ingresos, donde sus principales productos son la siembra de fríjol y apio. Actualmente, con 39 años de edad y un hogar conformado por su esposa y sus 2 hijos, Wilson de Jesús busca poder aumentar sus ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, y una manera de lograr esto, es aumentando la cantidad de productos que siembra, para la cual desea iniciar un nuevo cultivo de cilantro para el cual requiere de la compra de semillas, abonos, riegos, fertilizantes y materiales tales como madera y alambre para poder cercar su cultivo y así cumplir su sueño.
texts.en: Wilson de Jesús is a man who emigrated from his town in search of a better life alternative.  Some time ago he had to leave his town to look for better economic stability in the town of Marinilla in the east of Antioquia Department where he saw farming as a possible source of income.  He learned farming in this town and since then it’s been his source of income through bean and celery farming.  Currently, at the age of 39 and with a home consisting of his wife and two children, Wilson de Jesús seeks to increase his income to improve the quality of life for his household members and a way of doing this is to increase the amount of products he farms. He would like to invest in a new crop of cilantro and for this reason he needs to purchase seeds, fertilizers, irrigation supplies, fertilizers, and wood and wire to be able to fence in his crop and in this way comply with his dream.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, irrigation supplies, and fertilizer to start his cilantro harvest

loans.name: Mary Shirley

texts.es: La señora Mary es socia antigua de nuestra institución ya que se encuentra en su segunda secuencia, ella es casada y tiene 2 hijas  pequeñas, vive en casa familiar. La Señora tiene el negocio de repostería y que entrega a pedido tortas para todo acontecimiento (cumpleaños, bautizo, matrimonios, etc); su negocio  tiene una antigüedad de mas de 5 años   y el crédito que solicitó es para compra de insumos para la elaboración de sus tortas, como harina y leche y el saldo es para el pago de una deuda,  le va muy bien con su actividad ya que el negocio esta creciendo, es una persona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado
texts.en:
Mary is a long-time member of our institution and she is in her second loan cycle. 
 Mary is married and has 2 small daughters and they live in a family home. Her business is a bakery and she bakes cakes for all types of events (birthdays, baptisms, weddings, etc).  She has had her business for more than 5 years and she will use the requested loan to buy ingredients to make the cakes such as flour and milk, and the balance to pay off a debt.  Her business is going very well and is growing.  Mary is very hard-working and appreciative of the institution that is offering her the support.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to bake cakes such as flour and milk, and to use the balance to pay off a debt

loans.name: Elder

texts.es:
Elder, de 29 años, es una hombre amable, bueno y muy trabajador. Convive con su pareja con quien tiene dos hijos de 06 y 02 años, él vive junto a su familia en casa de su hermana. Todos los días se esfuerza mucho para así poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. El trabajo de Elder consiste en el transporte de pasajeros dentro y fuera de la ciudad. Desde muy temprano sale en busca de sus eventuales clientes a quienes brinda un servicio de calidad y con calidez humana, adicional a la seguridad. Pues él como un transportista responsable tiene siempre en regla su documentación y esta al pendiente de las fallas que pueda tener su vehiculo para la satisfacción de sus clientes. Cuando se inicio en este trabajo manejaba una mototaxi de manera de alquiler, esto no le producía muchos ingresos y por lo mismo no estaba contento haciendo esa actividad, ahora pudo comprar su vehiculo y trabaja para él mismo. Lleva 6 años trabajando de manera independiente y le esta yendo muy bien. Le gusta mucho su trabajo pues se distrae, divierte y sobre todo genera ingresos diarios para su familia, además que tiene un gran apoyo de su conviviente, quien se encarga de vender algunos productos en la vereda de su casa y significa un ingreso adicional a su economía. Ahora piensa continuar con la expansión de su negocio y aumentar mercadería. Este será el cuarto préstamo con MFP, está muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete una vez mas en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal por que todos sus integrantes son personas muy responsables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado realizará el arreglo o cambio de algunas piezas de su mototaxi, además comprará frutas y abarrotes para seguir con la venta desde su hogar.
texts.en:
Elder, aged 29, is a good kind man and a hard worker. He lives with his partner and they have two children, aged 6 and 2. He lives with the family, in his sister's house. Every day he works hard to offer his family a better quality of life. Elder's work consists of transporting passangers in and outside the city. He sets off very early to look for customers, and he provides them with good service and a warm reception, as well as the security of taking a moto taxi. As a responsible transport operative, he always has his papers in order, and he depends on having a vehicle that customers are happy to ride in. When he started out in this business, he used to rent a moto taxi, but he was not happy with that and it was hard to generate much of an income. He has since been able to buy his own vehicle, and has been working independently for 6 years now. It is going well. He likes his work a lot, because it is interestinig, it can be fun, and above all it generates income for his family.

Elder is also ably supported by his partner, who sells various different products from the sidewalk outside their house to bring in additional income. Now she plans to expand what she sells and carry a greater range of products. This will be Elder's fourth loan with MFP. He is very happy knowing that he can access this financial support, because it gives him confidence that he can continue in his business. He promises once again to make his repayments on time, as he did on the previous loans he had. Also he is grateful to be part of his communal bank, because he says that its members are all very responsible people who pull together. With the sum he is seeking he will repair or change parts of his mototaxi. He will also buy fruit and vegetables to sell outside his home.

loans.use: To buy parts for his moto taxi, and also to buy fruit and other produce for his partner to sell.

loans.name: Pablo Antonio

texts.es:
El sr. Pablo tiene 59 años de edad, vive en el barrio el porvenir de la ciudad de Choluteca, Pablo es un hombre emprendedor y dedicado a su negocio, el cual es la compra y venta de ganado, mismo que lo vende en varios lugares cercanos de la zona en donde vive, tiene 10 años de dedicarse a este tipo de actividad. 
Su esposa produce y vende tortillas, juntos trabajan duro para salir adelante.
Pablo es padre de 5 hijos, los cuales estan estudiando en el centro educativo de la comunidad.
en sus tiempos libres Pablo y su familia visitan la iglesia. 
El credito lo invertira en compra de ganado vacuno.
texts.en:
Pablo is 59 years old and lives in the neigbourhood of El Porvenir in the city of Choluteca. Pablo is an enterprising man who makes a living in the business of buying and selling cattle. He sells in various places close to the area where he lives and has made a living in this activity for 10 years.

His wife makes and sells tortillas. Together they work hard in order to get ahead.

Pablo is the father of 5 children, who are studying in the educational centre of the community.

In his free time Pablo and his family go to church.

He will invest the loan in buying cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Jenny

texts.es:
Jenny, de 37 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy activa, siempre demostró sus ganas de superarse ya que crío a sus tres hijos ella sola. Ahora dos de sus hijos ya son mayores e independientes, mientras que la menor de 14 años aún vive a su lado y depende de ella para su educación. Juntas viven en su casa propia en donde también esta por el momento uno de sus hijos mayores. El trabajo de Jenny consiste en la fabricación de barras de ceras que se utilizan para protección de la cadenas de los vehículos que funcionan con este sistema. Todo su trabajo lo realiza en su casa en donde tiene una planta artesanal para poder dar forma y tamaño al producto que después sale a vender en los comercios de repuestos. Por otro lado tiene una tienda en donde ofrece a los diferentes mototaxistas que pasan. Lleva realizando éste trabajo por 1 año y antes de esto trabajaba para otras personas cosa que le impedía tener buenas ganancias, ahora con su propio negocio mejoró mucho su situación.
Le gusta mucho lo que hace pues le da libertad de manejar su tiempo además de poder generar ingresos buenos a su hogar, por lo pronto espera poder seguir creciendo y así mejorar su producto. Este será el crédito número 5 con MFP, siempre fue muy buena socia en su banco comunal en donde la quieren mucho por que es muy responsable y solidaria, espera que le puedan brindar el préstamo que será un respaldo para ella y seguir aumentando su negocio. Esta convencida que seguirá siendo una socia muy puntual y pagará sus cuotas a tiempo como todos los préstamos que tuvo hasta ahora. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará materiales y productos para continuar haciendo su trabajo y así ganará más dinero.
texts.en:
Jenny is 37 years old. She is a good, kind and very active woman who has always shown her desire to exceed herself as she has raised her three children alone. Now, two of her children are adults and independent, whilst the youngest, who is 14 years old, still lives by her side and depends on her for her education. They live together in their own house where one of her older children is also staying for the moment. Jenny's work consists in making wax sticks that are used to protect the chains of vehicles that work with this system. She does all her work from her home where she has an artisan mould to give the product its shape and size which she later sells to auto parts businesses. On the other hand, she has a shop where she caters to the different motorcycle taxi drivers that pass by. She has carried out this work for the past year and before this she worked for other people who held her back from obtaining a good wage. Now, with her own business her situation has greatly improved.

She likes what she does as it gives her freedom to manage her time as well as being able to bring a good income into the home. For now she hopes to be able to continue growing and improving her product. This would be her fifth loan with MFP. She was always a good member in her communal bank where she is loved because she is responsible and supportive. She hope to receive this loan as it will be a support for her to continue expending her business. She is convinced that she will continue to be a very punctual member and will pay her quotas on time as she did with all the loans she has received up until now. With the amount requested of 1500 PEN she will buy materials and products to continue doing her work and so earn more money.

loans.use: to buy materials to make wax sticks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Isaac

texts.es: El señor Isaac vive en la zona villa primavera de la cuidad de el Alto, esta casado con la señora Nelly  y tiene tres hijos quienes se encuentran en edad escolar. Se dedica al tejido y venta de chompas de lana. Tiene un puesto de venta en la feria de la localidad de desaguadero que se encuentra en la frontera de Bolivia con Perú, y viaja allá todos los viernes junto a su esposa a vender las chompas. Uno de sus mayores anhelos es poder ampliar su negocio para obtener mayores ingresos y realizar la ampliación de cuartos en su casa. Y también esperan apoyar a sus hijos para que ellos puedan llegar a ser profesionales. En esta oportunidad don Isaac solicita el préstamo de dinero para la compra de bolsas de lana para incrementar el capital de su negocio.
texts.en:
Señor Isaac lives in the Villa Primavera area of the city of Alto. He is married to Señora Nelly and has three school-age children. He knits and sells woolen sweaters for a living. He has a stall at the Desaguadero market which is on the border of Bolivia and Perú and he travels there every Friday with his wife to sell the sweaters.

One of his greatest wishes to be able to expand his business in order to have a better income and to carry out an extension of his house. They also hope to support their children so that they will grow up to become professionals. At this time Don Isaac is requesting a loan to buy bags of wool to increase the capital of his business.

loans.use: to buy wool to knit sweaters

loans.name: Estefany

texts.es: La señora Estefany se dedica a la venta de ropa dese hace dos años, ella tiene 21 años y tiene una hija de 3 años, ella es madre soltera debido a que se separo de su cónyuge, vive en casa alquilada ella y su hija en la zona de Puntiti, la señora Estefany se dedica al comercio de ropa, ella vende los días lunes, miércoles, jueves, viernes, sábados y domingo. Ella es ambulante no tiene un puesto fijo, aprovecha los días de feria en la localidad de Sacaba, y los días de feria en el centro de Cochabamba para vender su mercadería. El préstamo que pide es para incrementar capital de trabajo y también busca adquirir nuevos modelos por cambio de temporada, la Sra. Estefany se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Mrs. Estefany sells clothes for a living and has been in business for two years.  She is 21, divorced, and has a 3-year-old daughter.  They live in a rented house in the Puntiti area.  Her workdays are Monday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday.  She is a traveling saleslady and has no fixed stall, but sells her goods on fleamarket days in the town of Sacaba and downtown Cochabamba.  

The loan she is requesting is to increase her working capital so she can buy apparel for the new season.  Estefany is grateful to the institution for its support.

loans.use: To buy clothing for the new season.

loans.name: Medali

texts.es:
Medali, de 25 años, es una joven mujer. Convive con su pareja, con quien tiene tres hijos. Es muy amable y trabajadora, vive en casa de los padres de su pareja en donde hace lo posible para mejorar su calidad de vida y brindar lo mejor a su familia. El trabajo de Medali consiste en la venta de pescado. A diario y desde muy temprano se va al puerto en busca de los pescados mas frescos y gordos. Con este producto en mano se traslada después al mercado de su ciudad, en donde tiene un pequeño puesto, desde ahí comienza el trabajo de limpiar el pescado, y colocarlos a la vista del publico para su venta. Tiene buenos clientes a quienes se ganó desde el primer día que empezó con este negocio; su carisma, su amabilidad hace que siempre vuelvan y compren en su puesto. Lleva trabajando ya por cinco años y lo hace con la ayuda de su conviviente y juntos hacen un buen equipo de trabajo. Le gusta mucho lo que hace, pues le permite tener su tiempo libre por las tardes y utiliza ese tiempo para ayudar a sus hijos con las tareas y otras actividades. Espera poder ampliar su negocio y crecer para así seguir mejorando su condición económica. Este será el tercer préstamo con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal por que todos sus integrantes son personas muy responsables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará pescados y bandejas en donde poder colocar sus productos, además utilizará parte del monto para mejorar las condiciones de su local.
texts.en:
Medali, 25, is a young woman who lives with her common-law husband and three children.
